an4.100:1.1: Atha kho potaliyo paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
an4.100:1.2: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho potaliyaṁ paribbājakaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an4.100:2.3: Idha, potaliya, ekacco puggalo avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena, no ca kho vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena.
an4.100:2.4: Idha pana, potaliya, ekacco puggalo vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena, no ca kho avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena.
an4.100:2.5: Idha pana, potaliya, ekacco puggalo neva avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena, no ca vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena.
an4.100:2.6: Idha pana, potaliya, ekacco puggalo avaṇṇārahassa ca avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena, vaṇṇārahassa ca vaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena.
an4.100:2.7: Ime kho, potaliya, cattāro puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4.100:2.8: Imesaṁ kho, potaliya, catunnaṁ puggalānaṁ katamo te puggalo khamati abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti?
an4.100:3.1: “Cattārome, bho gotama, puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4.100:3.3: Idha, bho gotama, ekacco puggalo avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena, no ca kho vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena.
an4.100:3.4: Idha pana, bho gotama, ekacco puggalo vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena, no ca kho avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena.
an4.100:3.5: Idha pana, bho gotama, ekacco puggalo neva avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena, no ca vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena.
an4.100:3.6: Idha pana, bho gotama, ekacco puggalo avaṇṇārahassa ca avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena, vaṇṇārahassa ca vaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena.
an4.100:3.7: Ime kho, bho gotama, cattāro puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4.100:3.8: Imesaṁ, bho gotama, catunnaṁ puggalānaṁ yvāyaṁ puggalo neva avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena, no ca vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena;
an4.100:3.9: ayaṁ me puggalo khamati imesaṁ catunnaṁ puggalānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an4.100:3.11: Abhikkantā hesā, bho gotama, yadidaṁ upekkhā”ti.
an4.100:4.2: Katame cattāro …pe… ime kho, potaliya, cattāro puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4.100:4.3: Imesaṁ kho, potaliya, catunnaṁ puggalānaṁ yvāyaṁ puggalo avaṇṇārahassa ca avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena, vaṇṇārahassa ca vaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena;
an4.100:4.4: ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ puggalānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an4.100:4.6: Abhikkantā hesā, potaliya, yadidaṁ tattha tattha kālaññutā”ti.
an4.100:5.1: “Cattārome, bho gotama, puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4.100:5.2: Katame cattāro …pe… ime kho, bho gotama, cattāro puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4.100:5.3: Imesaṁ, bho gotama, catunnaṁ puggalānaṁ yvāyaṁ puggalo avaṇṇārahassa ca avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena, vaṇṇārahassa ca vaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena;
an4.100:5.4: ayaṁ me puggalo khamati imesaṁ catunnaṁ puggalānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an4.100:5.6: Abhikkantā hesā, bho gotama, yadidaṁ tattha tattha kālaññutā.
an4.100:6.1: Abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama.
an4.100:6.2_0: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṁ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṁ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa
an4.100:6.2_1: vā maggaṁ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṁ dhāreyya: ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti;
an4.100:6.2_2: evamevaṁ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
an4.100:6.3: Esāhaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
an4.100:6.4: Upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
an4.101:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an4.101:2.8: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro valāhakūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4.101:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjitā hoti no vassitā?
an4.101:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo bhāsitā hoti, no kattā.
an4.101:3.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjitā hoti, no vassitā.
an4.101:3.4: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, valāhako gajjitā, no vassitā;
an4.101:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo vassitā hoti, no gajjitā?
an4.101:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo kattā hoti, no bhāsitā.
an4.101:4.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo vassitā hoti, no gajjitā.
an4.101:4.4: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, valāhako vassitā, no gajjitā;
an4.101:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo neva gajjitā hoti, no vassitā?
an4.101:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo neva bhāsitā hoti, no kattā.
an4.101:5.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo neva gajjitā hoti, no vassitā.
an4.101:5.4: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, valāhako neva gajjitā, no vassitā;
an4.101:6.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjitā ca hoti vassitā ca?
an4.101:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo bhāsitā ca hoti kattā ca.
an4.101:6.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjitā ca hoti vassitā ca.
an4.101:6.4: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, valāhako gajjitā ca vassitā ca;
an4.101:6.6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro valāhakūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4.102:1.8: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro valāhakūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4.102:2.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjitā hoti, no vassitā?
an4.102:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dhammaṁ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.102:2.3: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
an4.102:2.4_0: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti, ‘ayaṁ dukkhasamudayo’ti yathābhūtaṁ
an4.102:2.5: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjitā hoti, no vassitā.
an4.102:2.6: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, valāhako gajjitā, no vassitā;
an4.102:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo vassitā hoti, no gajjitā?
an4.102:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dhammaṁ na pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.102:3.3: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
an4.102:3.4: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
an4.102:3.5: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo vassitā hoti, no gajjitā.
an4.102:3.6: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, valāhako vassitā, no gajjitā;
an4.102:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo neva gajjitā hoti, no vassitā?
an4.102:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo neva dhammaṁ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.102:4.3: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
an4.102:4.4: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
an4.102:4.5: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo neva gajjitā hoti, no vassitā.
an4.102:4.6: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, valāhako neva gajjitā, no vassitā;
an4.102:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjitā ca hoti vassitā ca?
an4.102:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dhammaṁ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.102:5.3: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
an4.102:5.4: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
an4.102:5.5: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjitā ca hoti vassitā ca.
an4.102:5.6: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, valāhako gajjitā ca vassitā ca;
an4.102:5.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro valāhakūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4.103:1.8: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro kumbhūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4.103:2.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo tuccho hoti pihito?
an4.103:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pāsādikaṁ hoti abhikkantaṁ paṭikkantaṁ ālokitaṁ vilokitaṁ samiñjitaṁ pasāritaṁ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṁ.
an4.103:2.3: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
an4.103:2.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo tuccho hoti pihito.
an4.103:2.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, kumbho tuccho pihito;
an4.103:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo pūro hoti vivaṭo?
an4.103:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pāsādikaṁ hoti abhikkantaṁ paṭikkantaṁ ālokitaṁ vilokitaṁ samiñjitaṁ pasāritaṁ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṁ.
an4.103:3.3: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
an4.103:3.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pūro hoti vivaṭo.
an4.103:3.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, kumbho pūro vivaṭo;
an4.103:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo tuccho hoti vivaṭo?
an4.103:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pāsādikaṁ hoti abhikkantaṁ paṭikkantaṁ ālokitaṁ vilokitaṁ samiñjitaṁ pasāritaṁ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṁ.
an4.103:4.3: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
an4.103:4.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo tuccho hoti vivaṭo.
an4.103:4.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, kumbho tuccho vivaṭo;
an4.103:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo pūro hoti pihito?
an4.103:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pāsādikaṁ hoti abhikkantaṁ paṭikkantaṁ ālokitaṁ vilokitaṁ samiñjitaṁ pasāritaṁ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṁ.
an4.103:5.3: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
an4.103:5.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pūro hoti pihito.
an4.103:5.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, kumbho pūro pihito;
an4.103:5.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro kumbhūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4.104:1.8: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro udakarahadūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4.104:2.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo uttāno hoti gambhīrobhāso?
an4.104:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pāsādikaṁ hoti abhikkantaṁ paṭikkantaṁ ālokitaṁ vilokitaṁ samiñjitaṁ pasāritaṁ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṁ.
an4.104:2.3: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
an4.104:2.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo uttāno hoti gambhīrobhāso.
an4.104:2.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, udakarahado uttāno gambhīrobhāso;
an4.104:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo gambhīro hoti uttānobhāso?
an4.104:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pāsādikaṁ hoti abhikkantaṁ paṭikkantaṁ ālokitaṁ vilokitaṁ samiñjitaṁ pasāritaṁ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṁ.
an4.104:3.3: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
an4.104:3.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gambhīro hoti uttānobhāso.
an4.104:3.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, udakarahado gambhīro uttānobhāso;
an4.104:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo uttāno hoti uttānobhāso?
an4.104:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pāsādikaṁ hoti abhikkantaṁ paṭikkantaṁ ālokitaṁ vilokitaṁ samiñjitaṁ pasāritaṁ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṁ.
an4.104:4.3: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
an4.104:4.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo uttāno hoti uttānobhāso.
an4.104:4.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, udakarahado uttāno uttānobhāso;
an4.104:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo gambhīro hoti gambhīrobhāso?
an4.104:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pāsādikaṁ hoti abhikkantaṁ paṭikkantaṁ ālokitaṁ vilokitaṁ samiñjitaṁ pasāritaṁ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṁ.
an4.104:5.3: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
an4.104:5.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gambhīro hoti gambhīrobhāso.
an4.104:5.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, udakarahado gambhīro gambhīrobhāso;
an4.104:5.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro udakarahadūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4.105:1.8: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro ambūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4.105:2.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo āmo hoti pakkavaṇṇī?
an4.105:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pāsādikaṁ hoti abhikkantaṁ paṭikkantaṁ ālokitaṁ vilokitaṁ samiñjitaṁ pasāritaṁ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṁ.
an4.105:2.3: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
an4.105:2.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo āmo hoti pakkavaṇṇī.
an4.105:2.5: Seyyathāpi taṁ, bhikkhave, ambaṁ āmaṁ pakkavaṇṇi;
an4.105:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo pakko hoti āmavaṇṇī?
an4.105:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pāsādikaṁ hoti abhikkantaṁ paṭikkantaṁ ālokitaṁ vilokitaṁ samiñjitaṁ pasāritaṁ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṁ.
an4.105:3.3: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
an4.105:3.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pakko hoti āmavaṇṇī.
an4.105:3.5: Seyyathāpi taṁ, bhikkhave, ambaṁ pakkaṁ āmavaṇṇi;
an4.105:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo āmo hoti āmavaṇṇī?
an4.105:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pāsādikaṁ hoti abhikkantaṁ paṭikkantaṁ ālokitaṁ vilokitaṁ samiñjitaṁ pasāritaṁ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṁ.
an4.105:4.3: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
an4.105:4.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo āmo hoti āmavaṇṇī.
an4.105:4.5: Seyyathāpi taṁ, bhikkhave, ambaṁ āmaṁ āmavaṇṇi;
an4.105:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo pakko hoti pakkavaṇṇī?
an4.105:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pāsādikaṁ hoti abhikkantaṁ paṭikkantaṁ ālokitaṁ vilokitaṁ samiñjitaṁ pasāritaṁ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṁ.
an4.105:5.3: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
an4.105:5.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pakko hoti pakkavaṇṇī.
an4.105:5.5: Seyyathāpi taṁ, bhikkhave, ambaṁ pakkaṁ pakkavaṇṇi;
an4.105:5.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro ambūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4.107:1.8: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro mūsikūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4.107:2.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo gādhaṁ kattā hoti no vasitā?
an4.107:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dhammaṁ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.107:2.3: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
an4.107:2.4: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
an4.107:2.5: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gādhaṁ kattā hoti, no vasitā.
an4.107:2.6: Seyyathāpi sā, bhikkhave, mūsikā gādhaṁ kattā, no vasitā;
an4.107:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo vasitā hoti, no gādhaṁ kattā?
an4.107:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dhammaṁ na pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.107:3.3: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
an4.107:3.4: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
an4.107:3.5: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo vasitā hoti, no gādhaṁ kattā.
an4.107:3.6: Seyyathāpi sā, bhikkhave, mūsikā vasitā hoti, no gādhaṁ kattā;
an4.107:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo neva gādhaṁ kattā hoti no vasitā?
an4.107:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dhammaṁ na pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.107:4.3: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
an4.107:4.4: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
an4.107:4.5: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo neva gādhaṁ kattā hoti, no vasitā.
an4.107:4.6: Seyyathāpi sā, bhikkhave, mūsikā neva gādhaṁ kattā hoti, no vasitā;
an4.107:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo gādhaṁ kattā ca hoti vasitā ca?
an4.107:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dhammaṁ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.107:5.3: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
an4.107:5.4: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
an4.107:5.5: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gādhaṁ kattā ca hoti vasitā ca.
an4.107:5.6: Seyyathāpi sā, bhikkhave, mūsikā gādhaṁ kattā ca hoti vasitā ca;
an4.107:5.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro mūsikūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4.108:1.8: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro balībaddūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4.108:2.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo sagavacaṇḍo hoti, no paragavacaṇḍo?
an4.108:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sakaparisaṁ ubbejetā hoti, no paraparisaṁ.
an4.108:2.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sagavacaṇḍo hoti, no paragavacaṇḍo.
an4.108:2.4: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, balībaddo sagavacaṇḍo, no paragavacaṇḍo;
an4.108:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo paragavacaṇḍo hoti, no sagavacaṇḍo?
an4.108:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo paraparisaṁ ubbejetā hoti, no sakaparisaṁ.
an4.108:3.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo paragavacaṇḍo hoti, no sagavacaṇḍo.
an4.108:3.4: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, balībaddo paragavacaṇḍo, no sagavacaṇḍo;
an4.108:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo sagavacaṇḍo ca hoti paragavacaṇḍo ca?
an4.108:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sakaparisaṁ ubbejetā hoti paraparisañca.
an4.108:4.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sagavacaṇḍo ca hoti paragavacaṇḍo ca.
an4.108:4.4: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, balībaddo sagavacaṇḍo ca paragavacaṇḍo ca;
an4.108:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo neva sagavacaṇḍo hoti no paragavacaṇḍo?
an4.108:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo neva sakaparisaṁ ubbejetā hoti, no paraparisañca.
an4.108:5.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo neva sagavacaṇḍo hoti, no paragavacaṇḍo.
an4.108:5.4: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, balībaddo neva sagavacaṇḍo, no paragavacaṇḍo;
an4.108:5.6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro balībaddūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4.109:1.8: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro rukkhūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4.109:2.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo pheggu hoti phegguparivāro?
an4.109:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dussīlo hoti pāpadhammo;
an4.109:2.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pheggu hoti phegguparivāro.
an4.109:2.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, rukkho pheggu phegguparivāro;
an4.109:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo pheggu hoti sāraparivāro?
an4.109:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dussīlo hoti pāpadhammo;
an4.109:3.3: parisā ca khvassa hoti sīlavatī kalyāṇadhammā.
an4.109:3.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pheggu hoti sāraparivāro.
an4.109:3.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, rukkho pheggu sāraparivāro;
an4.109:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo sāro hoti phegguparivāro?
an4.109:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sīlavā hoti kalyāṇadhammo;
an4.109:4.3: parisā ca khvassa hoti dussīlā pāpadhammā.
an4.109:4.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sāro hoti phegguparivāro.
an4.109:4.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, rukkho sāro phegguparivāro;
an4.109:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo sāro hoti sāraparivāro?
an4.109:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sīlavā hoti kalyāṇadhammo;
an4.109:5.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sāro hoti sāraparivāro.
an4.109:5.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, rukkho sāro sāraparivāro;
an4.109:5.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro rukkhūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4.110:1.8: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro āsīvisūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4.110:2.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo āgataviso hoti, na ghoraviso?
an4.110:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṁ kujjhati.
an4.110:2.3: So ca khvassa kodho na dīgharattaṁ anuseti.
an4.110:2.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo āgataviso hoti, na ghoraviso.
an4.110:2.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, āsīviso āgataviso, na ghoraviso;
an4.110:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo ghoraviso hoti, na āgataviso?
an4.110:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na heva kho abhiṇhaṁ kujjhati.
an4.110:3.3: So ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṁ anuseti.
an4.110:3.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ghoraviso hoti, na āgataviso.
an4.110:3.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, āsīviso ghoraviso, na āgataviso;
an4.110:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo āgataviso ca hoti ghoraviso ca?
an4.110:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṁ kujjhati.
an4.110:4.3: So ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṁ anuseti.
an4.110:4.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo āgataviso ca hoti ghoraviso ca.
an4.110:4.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, āsīviso āgataviso ca ghoraviso ca;
an4.110:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo nevāgataviso hoti na ghoraviso?
an4.110:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na heva kho abhiṇhaṁ kujjhati.
an4.110:5.3: So ca khvassa kodho na dīgharattaṁ anuseti.
an4.110:5.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nevāgataviso hoti, na ghoraviso.
an4.110:5.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, āsīviso nevāgataviso na ghoraviso;
an4.110:5.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro āsīvisūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4.111:1.1_0: Atha kho kesi assadammasārathi yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ
an4.111:1.1_1: abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho kesiṁ assadammasārathiṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an4.111:1.3: Kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, kesi, assadammaṁ vinesī”ti?
an4.111:1.4: “Ahaṁ kho, bhante, assadammaṁ saṇhenapi vinemi, pharusenapi vinemi, saṇhapharusenapi vinemī”ti.
an4.111:1.5: “Sace te, kesi, assadammo saṇhena vinayaṁ na upeti, pharusena vinayaṁ na upeti, saṇhapharusena vinayaṁ na upeti, kinti naṁ karosī”ti?
an4.111:1.6: “Sace me, bhante, assadammo saṇhena vinayaṁ na upeti, pharusena vinayaṁ na upeti, saṇhapharusena vinayaṁ na upeti;
an4.111:2.2: Kathaṁ pana, bhante, bhagavā purisadammaṁ vinetī”ti?
an4.111:2.3: “Ahaṁ kho, kesi, purisadammaṁ saṇhenapi vinemi, pharusenapi vinemi, saṇhapharusenapi vinemi.
an4.111:2.5: iti kāyasucaritaṁ iti kāyasucaritassa vipāko, iti vacīsucaritaṁ iti vacīsucaritassa vipāko, iti manosucaritaṁ iti manosucaritassa vipāko, iti devā, iti manussāti.
an4.111:2.7_0: iti kāyaduccaritaṁ iti kāyaduccaritassa vipāko, iti vacīduccaritaṁ iti vacīduccaritassa
an4.111:2.7_1: vipāko, iti manoduccaritaṁ iti manoduccaritassa vipāko, iti nirayo, iti tiracchānayoni, iti pettivisayoti.
an4.111:3.2_0: iti kāyasucaritaṁ iti kāyasucaritassa vipāko, iti kāyaduccaritaṁ iti kāyaduccaritassa
an4.111:3.2_1: vipāko, iti vacīsucaritaṁ iti vacīsucaritassa vipāko, iti vacīduccaritaṁ iti vacīduccaritassa
an4.111:3.2_2: vipāko, iti manosucaritaṁ iti manosucaritassa vipāko, iti manoduccaritaṁ iti manoduccaritassa
an4.111:3.2_3: vipāko, iti devā, iti manussā, iti nirayo, iti tiracchānayoni, iti pettivisayo”ti.
an4.111:4.1: “Sace te, bhante, purisadammo saṇhena vinayaṁ na upeti, pharusena vinayaṁ na upeti, saṇhapharusena vinayaṁ na upeti, kinti naṁ bhagavā karotī”ti?
an4.111:4.2: “Sace me, kesi, purisadammo saṇhena vinayaṁ na upeti, pharusena vinayaṁ na upeti, saṇhapharusena vinayaṁ na upeti, hanāmi naṁ, kesī”ti.
an4.111:4.8_0: Api ca yo purisadammo saṇhena vinayaṁ na upeti, pharusena vinayaṁ na upeti, saṇhapharusena
an4.111:4.8_1: vinayaṁ na upeti, na taṁ tathāgato vattabbaṁ anusāsitabbaṁ maññati, nāpi viññū sabrahmacārī
an4.111:4.10: yaṁ na tathāgato vattabbaṁ anusāsitabbaṁ maññati, nāpi viññū sabrahmacārī vattabbaṁ anusāsitabbaṁ maññantī”ti.
an4.111:5.2: yaṁ na tathāgato vattabbaṁ anusāsitabbaṁ maññati, nāpi viññū sabrahmacārī vattabbaṁ anusāsitabbaṁ maññantīti.
an4.111:5.3: Abhikkantaṁ, bhante, abhikkantaṁ, bhante …pe… upāsakaṁ maṁ, bhante, bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
an4.112:1.1: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhadro assājānīyo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo, rañño aṅganteva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
an4.112:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhadro assājānīyo rājāraho hoti, rājabhoggo, rañño aṅganteva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
an4.112:2.1: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
an4.112:2.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā”ti.
an4.113:1.1: “Cattārome, bhikkhave, bhadrā assājānīyā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4.113:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco bhadro assājānīyo patodacchāyaṁ disvā saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati:
an4.113:1.4: ‘kiṁ nu kho maṁ ajja assadammasārathi kāraṇaṁ kāressati, kimassāhaṁ paṭikaromī’ti.
an4.113:1.5: Evarūpopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro assājānīyo hoti.
an4.113:1.6: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo bhadro assājānīyo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
an4.113:2.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro assājānīyo na heva kho patodacchāyaṁ disvā saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati, api ca kho lomavedhaviddho saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati:
an4.113:2.2: ‘kiṁ nu kho maṁ ajja assadammasārathi kāraṇaṁ kāressati, kimassāhaṁ paṭikaromī’ti.
an4.113:2.3: Evarūpopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro assājānīyo hoti.
an4.113:2.4: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo bhadro assājānīyo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
an4.113:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro assājānīyo na heva kho patodacchāyaṁ disvā
an4.113:3.1_1: saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati nāpi lomavedhaviddho saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati, api
an4.113:3.1_2: ca kho cammavedhaviddho saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati:
an4.113:3.2: ‘kiṁ nu kho maṁ ajja assadammasārathi kāraṇaṁ kāressati, kimassāhaṁ paṭikaromī’ti.
an4.113:3.3: Evarūpopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro assājānīyo hoti.
an4.113:3.4: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo bhadro assājānīyo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
an4.113:4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro assājānīyo na heva kho patodacchāyaṁ disvā
an4.113:4.1_1: saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati nāpi lomavedhaviddho saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati nāpi
an4.113:4.1_2: cammavedhaviddho saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati, api ca kho aṭṭhivedhaviddho saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati:
an4.113:4.2: ‘kiṁ nu kho maṁ ajja assadammasārathi kāraṇaṁ kāressati, kimassāhaṁ paṭikaromī’ti.
an4.113:4.3: Evarūpopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro assājānīyo hoti.
an4.113:4.4: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho bhadro assājānīyo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
an4.113:4.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro bhadrā assājānīyā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4.113:5.1: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, cattārome bhadrā purisājānīyā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4.113:5.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco bhadro purisājānīyo suṇāti:
an4.113:5.4: ‘amukasmiṁ nāma gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā puriso vā dukkhito vā kālaṅkato vā’ti.
an4.113:5.7: Pahitatto kāyena ceva paramasaccaṁ sacchikaroti, paññāya ca ativijjha passati.
an4.113:5.8: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, bhadro assājānīyo patodacchāyaṁ disvā saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati;
an4.113:5.9: tathūpamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imaṁ bhadraṁ purisājānīyaṁ vadāmi.
an4.113:5.10: Evarūpopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro purisājānīyo hoti.
an4.113:5.11: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo bhadro purisājānīyo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
an4.113:6.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro purisājānīyo na heva kho suṇāti:
an4.113:6.2: ‘amukasmiṁ nāma gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā puriso vā dukkhito vā kālaṅkato vā’ti, api ca kho sāmaṁ passati itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vā dukkhitaṁ vā kālaṅkataṁ vā.
an4.113:6.5: Pahitatto kāyena ceva paramasaccaṁ sacchikaroti, paññāya ca ativijjha passati.
an4.113:6.6: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, bhadro assājānīyo lomavedhaviddho saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati;
an4.113:6.7: tathūpamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imaṁ bhadraṁ purisājānīyaṁ vadāmi.
an4.113:6.8: Evarūpopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro purisājānīyo hoti.
an4.113:6.9: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo bhadro purisājānīyo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
an4.113:7.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro purisājānīyo na heva kho suṇāti:
an4.113:7.2_0: ‘amukasmiṁ nāma gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā puriso vā dukkhito vā kālaṅkato vā’ti,
an4.113:7.2_1: nāpi sāmaṁ passati itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vā dukkhitaṁ vā kālaṅkataṁ vā, api ca khvassa
an4.113:7.2_2: ñāti vā sālohito vā dukkhito vā hoti kālaṅkato vā.
an4.113:7.5: Pahitatto kāyena ceva paramasaccaṁ sacchikaroti, paññāya ca ativijjha passati.
an4.113:7.6: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, bhadro assājānīyo cammavedhaviddho saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati;
an4.113:7.7: tathūpamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imaṁ bhadraṁ purisājānīyaṁ vadāmi.
an4.113:7.8: Evarūpopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro purisājānīyo hoti.
an4.113:7.9: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo bhadro purisājānīyo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
an4.113:8.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro purisājānīyo na heva kho suṇāti:
an4.113:8.2_0: ‘amukasmiṁ nāma gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā puriso vā dukkhito vā kālaṅkato vā’ti,
an4.113:8.2_1: nāpi sāmaṁ passati itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vā dukkhitaṁ vā kālaṅkataṁ vā, nāpissa ñāti
an4.113:8.2_2: vā sālohito vā dukkhito vā hoti kālaṅkato vā, api ca kho sāmaññeva phuṭṭho hoti sārīrikāhi
an4.113:8.2_3: vedanāhi dukkhāhi tibbāhi kharāhi kaṭukāhi asātāhi amanāpāhi pāṇaharāhi.
an4.113:8.5: Pahitatto kāyena ceva paramasaccaṁ sacchikaroti, paññāya ca ativijjha passati.
an4.113:8.6: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, bhadro assājānīyo aṭṭhivedhaviddho saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati;
an4.113:8.7: tathūpamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imaṁ bhadraṁ purisājānīyaṁ vadāmi.
an4.113:8.8: Evarūpopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro purisājānīyo hoti.
an4.113:8.9: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho bhadro purisājānīyo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
an4.113:8.10: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro bhadrā purisājānīyā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4.114:1.1: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato rañño nāgo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo, rañño aṅganteva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
an4.114:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo sotā ca hoti, hantā ca, khantā ca, gantā ca.
an4.114:2.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo sotā hoti?
an4.114:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo yamenaṁ hatthidammasārathi kāraṇaṁ kāreti—
an4.114:2.3: yadi vā katapubbaṁ yadi vā akatapubbaṁ—
an4.114:2.4: taṁ aṭṭhiṁ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto suṇāti.
an4.114:2.5: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo sotā hoti.
an4.114:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo hantā hoti?
an4.114:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo saṅgāmagato hatthimpi hanati, hatthāruhampi hanati, assampi hanati, assāruhampi hanati, rathampi hanati, rathikampi hanati, pattikampi hanati.
an4.114:3.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo hantā hoti.
an4.114:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo khantā hoti?
an4.114:4.2: Idha bhikkhave, rañño nāgo saṅgāmagato khamo hoti sattippahārānaṁ asippahārānaṁ usuppahārānaṁ pharasuppahārānaṁ bheripaṇavasaṅkhatiṇavaninnādasaddānaṁ.
an4.114:4.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo khantā hoti.
an4.114:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo gantā hoti?
an4.114:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo yamenaṁ hatthidammasārathi disaṁ peseti—
an4.114:5.3: yadi vā gatapubbaṁ yadi vā agatapubbaṁ—
an4.114:5.5: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo gantā hoti.
an4.114:5.6: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño nāgo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo, rañño aṅganteva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
an4.114:6.1: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
an4.114:6.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sotā ca hoti, hantā ca, khantā ca, gantā ca.
an4.114:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye desiyamāne aṭṭhiṁ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṁ suṇāti.
an4.114:7.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sotā hoti.
an4.114:8.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannaṁ kāmavitakkaṁ nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti hanati
an4.114:8.2_1: byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti, uppannaṁ byāpādavitakkaṁ …pe… uppannaṁ vihiṁsāvitakkaṁ
an4.114:8.2_2: …pe… uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti hanati byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti.
an4.114:8.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hantā hoti.
an4.114:9.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassa jighacchāya pipāsāya, ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānaṁ
an4.114:9.2_1: duruttānaṁ durāgatānaṁ vacanapathānaṁ uppannānaṁ sārīrikānaṁ vedanānaṁ dukkhānaṁ
an4.114:9.2_2: tibbānaṁ kharānaṁ kaṭukānaṁ asātānaṁ amanāpānaṁ pāṇaharānaṁ adhivāsakajātiko hoti.
an4.114:9.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khantā hoti.
an4.114:10.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yāyaṁ disā agatapubbā iminā dīghena addhunā yadidaṁ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho
an4.114:10.2_1: sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṁ, taṁ khippaññeva gantā hoti.
an4.114:10.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gantā hoti.
an4.114:10.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā”ti.
an4.115:2.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidaṁ ṭhānaṁ amanāpaṁ kātuṁ;
an4.115:2.3: idaṁ, bhikkhave, ṭhānaṁ ubhayeneva na kattabbaṁ maññati.
an4.115:2.8: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, ṭhānaṁ ubhayeneva na kattabbaṁ maññati.
an4.115:3.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidaṁ ṭhānaṁ amanāpaṁ kātuṁ;
an4.115:3.3: imasmiṁ, bhikkhave, ṭhāne bālo ca paṇḍito ca veditabbo purisathāme purisavīriye purisaparakkame.
an4.115:3.6: atha carahidaṁ ṭhānaṁ kayiramānaṁ atthāya saṁvattatī’ti.
an4.115:3.8: Tassa taṁ ṭhānaṁ akayiramānaṁ anatthāya saṁvattati.
an4.115:3.9: Paṇḍito ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an4.115:3.11: atha carahidaṁ ṭhānaṁ kayiramānaṁ atthāya saṁvattatī’ti.
an4.115:3.13: Tassa taṁ ṭhānaṁ kayiramānaṁ atthāya saṁvattati.
an4.115:4.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidaṁ ṭhānaṁ manāpaṁ kātuṁ;
an4.115:4.3: imasmimpi, bhikkhave, ṭhāne bālo ca paṇḍito ca veditabbo purisathāme purisavīriye purisaparakkame.
an4.115:4.6: atha carahidaṁ ṭhānaṁ kayiramānaṁ anatthāya saṁvattatī’ti.
an4.115:4.8: Tassa taṁ ṭhānaṁ kayiramānaṁ anatthāya saṁvattati.
an4.115:4.9: Paṇḍito ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an4.115:4.11: atha carahidaṁ ṭhānaṁ kayiramānaṁ anatthāya saṁvattatī’ti.
an4.115:4.13: Tassa taṁ ṭhānaṁ akayiramānaṁ atthāya saṁvattati.
an4.115:5.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidaṁ ṭhānaṁ manāpaṁ kātuṁ, tañca kayiramānaṁ atthāya saṁvattati—
an4.115:5.2: idaṁ, bhikkhave, ṭhānaṁ ubhayeneva kattabbaṁ maññati.
an4.115:5.3: Yampidaṁ ṭhānaṁ manāpaṁ kātuṁ, imināpi naṁ kattabbaṁ maññati;
an4.115:5.4: yampidaṁ ṭhānaṁ kayiramānaṁ atthāya saṁvattati, imināpi naṁ kattabbaṁ maññati.
an4.115:5.5: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, ṭhānaṁ ubhayeneva kattabbaṁ maññati.
an4.116:2.1_0: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno kāyaduccaritaṁ pahīnaṁ hoti kāyasucaritaṁ bhāvitaṁ,
an4.116:2.1_1: vacīduccaritaṁ pahīnaṁ hoti vacīsucaritaṁ bhāvitaṁ, manoduccaritaṁ pahīnaṁ hoti manosucaritaṁ
an4.116:2.1_2: bhāvitaṁ, micchādiṭṭhi pahīnā hoti sammādiṭṭhi bhāvitā, so na bhāyati samparāyikassa maraṇassā”ti.
an4.117:1.1: “Catūsu, bhikkhave, ṭhānesu attarūpena appamādo sati cetaso ārakkho karaṇīyo.
an4.117:1.3: ‘Mā me rajanīyesu dhammesu cittaṁ rajjī’ti attarūpena appamādo sati cetaso ārakkho karaṇīyo;
an4.117:1.4: ‘mā me dosanīyesu dhammesu cittaṁ dussī’ti attarūpena appamādo sati cetaso ārakkho karaṇīyo;
an4.117:1.5: ‘mā me mohanīyesu dhammesu cittaṁ muyhī’ti attarūpena appamādo sati cetaso ārakkho karaṇīyo;
an4.117:1.6: ‘mā me madanīyesu dhammesu cittaṁ majjī’ti attarūpena appamādo sati cetaso ārakkho karaṇīyo.
an4.117:2.1_0: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno rajanīyesu dhammesu cittaṁ na rajjati vītarāgattā,
an4.117:2.1_1: dosanīyesu dhammesu cittaṁ na dussati vītadosattā, mohanīyesu dhammesu cittaṁ na
an4.117:2.1_2: muyhati vītamohattā, madanīyesu dhammesu cittaṁ na majjati vītamadattā, so na chambhati
an4.117:2.1_3: na kampati na vedhati na santāsaṁ āpajjati, na ca pana samaṇavacanahetupi gacchatī”ti.
an4.118:1.1: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassanīyāni saṁvejanīyāni ṭhānāni.
an4.118:1.3: ‘Idha tathāgato jāto’ti, bhikkhave, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassanīyaṁ saṁvejanīyaṁ ṭhānaṁ.
an4.118:1.4: ‘Idha tathāgato anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho’ti, bhikkhave, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassanīyaṁ saṁvejanīyaṁ ṭhānaṁ.
an4.118:1.5: ‘Idha tathāgato anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattesī’ti, bhikkhave, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassanīyaṁ saṁvejanīyaṁ ṭhānaṁ.
an4.118:1.6: ‘Idha tathāgato anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto’ti, bhikkhave, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassanīyaṁ saṁvejanīyaṁ ṭhānaṁ.
an4.118:1.7: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri saddhassa kulaputtassa dassanīyāni saṁvejanīyāni ṭhānānī”ti.
an4.121:2.3: ‘ahañceva kho pana kāyena duccaritaṁ careyyaṁ, vācāya duccaritaṁ careyyaṁ, manasā duccaritaṁ careyyaṁ, kiñca taṁ yaṁ maṁ attā sīlato na upavadeyyā’ti.
an4.121:2.4_0: So attānuvādabhayassa bhīto kāyaduccaritaṁ pahāya kāyasucaritaṁ bhāveti, vacīduccaritaṁ
an4.121:2.4_1: pahāya vacīsucaritaṁ bhāveti, manoduccaritaṁ pahāya manosucaritaṁ bhāveti, suddhaṁ attānaṁ pariharati.
an4.121:3.3: ‘ahañceva kho pana kāyena duccaritaṁ careyyaṁ, vācāya duccaritaṁ careyyaṁ, manasā duccaritaṁ careyyaṁ, kiñca taṁ yaṁ maṁ pare sīlato na upavadeyyun’ti.
an4.121:3.4_0: So parānuvādabhayassa bhīto kāyaduccaritaṁ pahāya kāyasucaritaṁ bhāveti, vacīduccaritaṁ
an4.121:3.4_1: pahāya vacīsucaritaṁ bhāveti, manoduccaritaṁ pahāya manosucaritaṁ bhāveti, suddhaṁ attānaṁ pariharati.
an4.121:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco passati coraṁ āgucāriṁ, rājāno gahetvā vividhā kammakāraṇā kārente,
an4.121:4.3_0: kasāhipi tāḷente, vettehipi tāḷente, addhadaṇḍakehipi tāḷente, hatthampi chindante,
an4.121:4.3_1: pādampi chindante, hatthapādampi chindante, kaṇṇampi chindante, nāsampi chindante,
an4.121:4.3_2: kaṇṇanāsampi chindante, bilaṅgathālikampi karonte, saṅkhamuṇḍikampi karonte, rāhumukhampi
an4.121:4.3_3: karonte, jotimālikampi karonte, hatthapajjotikampi karonte, erakavattikampi karonte,
an4.121:4.3_4: cīrakavāsikampi karonte, eṇeyyakampi karonte, balisamaṁsikampi karonte, kahāpaṇakampi
an4.121:4.3_5: karonte, khārāpatacchikampi karonte, palighaparivattikampi karonte, palālapīṭhakampi
an4.121:4.3_6: karonte, tattenapi telena osiñcante, sunakhehipi khādāpente, jīvantampi sūle uttāsente,
an4.121:5.2_0: ‘yathārūpānaṁ kho pāpakānaṁ kammānaṁ hetu coraṁ āgucāriṁ rājāno gahetvā vividhā kammakāraṇā
an4.121:5.2_1: kārenti, kasāhipi tāḷenti …pe… asināpi sīsaṁ chindanti, ahañceva kho pana evarūpaṁ
an4.121:5.2_2: pāpakammaṁ kareyyaṁ, mampi rājāno gahetvā evarūpā vividhā kammakāraṇā kāreyyuṁ, kasāhipi
an4.121:5.2_3: tāḷeyyuṁ, vettehipi tāḷeyyuṁ, addhadaṇḍakehipi tāḷeyyuṁ, hatthampi chindeyyuṁ, pādampi
an4.121:5.2_4: chindeyyuṁ, hatthapādampi chindeyyuṁ, kaṇṇampi chindeyyuṁ, nāsampi chindeyyuṁ, kaṇṇanāsampi
an4.121:5.3_0: rāhumukhampi kareyyuṁ, jotimālikampi kareyyuṁ, hatthapajjotikampi kareyyuṁ, erakavattikampi
an4.121:5.3_1: kareyyuṁ, cīrakavāsikampi kareyyuṁ, eṇeyyakampi kareyyuṁ, balisamaṁsikampi kareyyuṁ,
an4.121:5.3_2: kahāpaṇakampi kareyyuṁ, khārāpatacchikampi kareyyuṁ, palighaparivattikampi kareyyuṁ,
an4.121:5.3_3: palālapīṭhakampi kareyyuṁ, tattenapi telena osiñceyyuṁ, sunakhehipi khādāpeyyuṁ,
an4.121:5.3_4: jīvantampi sūle uttāseyyuṁ, asināpi sīsaṁ chindeyyun’ti.
an4.121:5.4: So daṇḍabhayassa bhīto na paresaṁ pābhataṁ vilumpanto carati.
an4.121:6.3: ‘kāyaduccaritassa kho pāpako vipāko abhisamparāyaṁ, vacīduccaritassa pāpako vipāko abhisamparāyaṁ, manoduccaritassa pāpako vipāko abhisamparāyaṁ.
an4.121:6.4_0: Ahañceva kho pana kāyena duccaritaṁ careyyaṁ, vācāya duccaritaṁ careyyaṁ, manasā
an4.121:6.4_1: duccaritaṁ careyyaṁ, kiñca taṁ yāhaṁ na kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ
an4.121:6.5_0: So duggatibhayassa bhīto kāyaduccaritaṁ pahāya kāyasucaritaṁ bhāveti, vacīduccaritaṁ
an4.121:6.5_1: pahāya vacīsucaritaṁ bhāveti, manoduccaritaṁ pahāya manosucaritaṁ bhāveti, suddhaṁ attānaṁ pariharati.
an4.122:1.4: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri bhayāni udakorohantassa pāṭikaṅkhitabbāni.
an4.122:1.5: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, cattāri bhayāni idhekaccassa kulaputtassa imasmiṁ dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitassa pāṭikaṅkhitabbāni.
an4.122:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
an4.122:2.3: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto;
an4.122:2.4: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
an4.122:2.5: Tamenaṁ tathā pabbajitaṁ samānaṁ sabrahmacārino ovadanti anusāsanti:
an4.122:2.6_0: ‘evaṁ te abhikkamitabbaṁ, evaṁ te paṭikkamitabbaṁ, evaṁ te āloketabbaṁ, evaṁ te viloketabbaṁ,
an4.122:2.6_1: evaṁ te samiñjitabbaṁ, evaṁ te pasāritabbaṁ, evaṁ te saṅghāṭipattacīvaraṁ dhāretabban’ti.
an4.122:2.8: ‘mayaṁ kho pubbe agāriyabhūtā samānā aññe ovadāmapi anusāsāmapi.
an4.122:2.9: Ime panamhākaṁ puttamattā maññe nattamattā maññe ovaditabbaṁ anusāsitabbaṁ maññantī’ti.
an4.122:2.10: So kupito anattamano sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
an4.122:2.11: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ūmibhayassa bhīto sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatto.
an4.122:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
an4.122:3.3: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto;
an4.122:3.4: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
an4.122:3.5: Tamenaṁ tathā pabbajitaṁ samānaṁ sabrahmacārino ovadanti anusāsanti:
an4.122:3.6_0: ‘idaṁ te khāditabbaṁ, idaṁ te na khāditabbaṁ, idaṁ te bhuñjitabbaṁ, idaṁ te na bhuñjitabbaṁ,
an4.122:3.6_1: idaṁ te sāyitabbaṁ, idaṁ te na sāyitabbaṁ, idaṁ te pātabbaṁ, idaṁ te na pātabbaṁ,
an4.122:3.6_2: kappiyaṁ te khāditabbaṁ, akappiyaṁ te na khāditabbaṁ, kappiyaṁ te bhuñjitabbaṁ, akappiyaṁ
an4.122:3.6_3: te na bhuñjitabbaṁ, kappiyaṁ te sāyitabbaṁ, akappiyaṁ te na sāyitabbaṁ, kappiyaṁ
an4.122:3.6_4: te pātabbaṁ, akappiyaṁ te na pātabbaṁ, kāle te khāditabbaṁ, vikāle te na khāditabbaṁ,
an4.122:3.6_5: kāle te bhuñjitabbaṁ, vikāle te na bhuñjitabbaṁ, kāle te sāyitabbaṁ, vikāle te na
an4.122:3.6_6: sāyitabbaṁ, kāle te pātabbaṁ, vikāle te na pātabban’ti.
an4.122:3.8: ‘mayaṁ kho pubbe agāriyabhūtā samānā yaṁ icchāma taṁ khādāma, yaṁ na icchāma na taṁ khādāma;
an4.122:3.9: yaṁ icchāma taṁ bhuñjāma, yaṁ na icchāma na taṁ bhuñjāma;
an4.122:3.10: yaṁ icchāma taṁ sāyāma, yaṁ na icchāma na taṁ sāyāma;
an4.122:3.11: yaṁ icchāma taṁ pivāma, yaṁ na icchāma na taṁ pivāma;
an4.122:3.12_0: kappiyampi khādāma akappiyampi khādāma kappiyampi bhuñjāma akappiyampi bhuñjāma kappiyampi
an4.122:3.12_1: sāyāma akappiyampi sāyāma kappiyampi pivāma akappiyampi pivāma, kālepi khādāma vikālepi
an4.122:3.12_2: khādāma kālepi bhuñjāma vikālepi bhuñjāma kālepi sāyāma vikālepi sāyāma kālepi pivāma vikālepi pivāma;
an4.122:3.13: yampi no saddhā gahapatikā divā vikāle paṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā denti, tatrapime mukhāvaraṇaṁ maññe karontī’ti.
an4.122:3.14: So kupito anattamano sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
an4.122:3.15: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kumbhīlabhayassa bhīto sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatto.
an4.122:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
an4.122:4.3: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi, dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto;
an4.122:4.4: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
an4.122:4.5_0: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ
an4.122:4.5_1: vā piṇḍāya pavisati arakkhiteneva kāyena arakkhitāya vācāya arakkhitena cittena anupaṭṭhitāya
an4.122:4.6: So tattha passati gahapatiṁ vā gahapatiputtaṁ vā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitaṁ samaṅgībhūtaṁ paricārayamānaṁ.
an4.122:4.8: ‘mayaṁ kho pubbe agāriyabhūtā samānā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitā samaṅgībhūtā paricārimhā;
an4.122:4.9: saṁvijjanti kho pana me kule bhogā.
an4.122:4.10: Sakkā bhoge ca bhuñjituṁ puññāni ca kātuṁ.
an4.122:4.11: Yannūnāhaṁ sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattitvā bhoge ca bhuñjeyyaṁ puññāni ca kareyyan’ti.
an4.122:4.13: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āvaṭṭabhayassa bhīto sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatto.
an4.122:4.14: Āvaṭṭabhayanti kho, bhikkhave, pañcannetaṁ kāmaguṇānaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
an4.122:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
an4.122:5.3: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto;
an4.122:5.4: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
an4.122:5.5_0: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ
an4.122:5.5_1: vā piṇḍāya pavisati arakkhiteneva kāyena arakkhitāya vācāya arakkhitena cittena anupaṭṭhitāya
an4.122:5.6: So tattha passati mātugāmaṁ dunnivatthaṁ vā duppārutaṁ vā.
an4.122:5.7: Tassa mātugāmaṁ disvā dunnivatthaṁ vā duppārutaṁ vā rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti.
an4.122:5.8: So rāgānuddhaṁsitena cittena sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
an4.122:5.9: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu susukābhayassa bhīto sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatto.
an4.122:5.12: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri bhayāni idhekaccassa kulaputtassa imasmiṁ dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitassa pāṭikaṅkhitabbānī”ti.
an4.123:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.123:1.4: So tadassādeti, taṁ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati.
an4.123:1.5: Tattha ṭhito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihārī aparihīno kālaṁ kurumāno brahmakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an4.123:1.7: Tattha puthujjano yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā nirayampi gacchati tiracchānayonimpi gacchati pettivisayampi gacchati.
an4.123:1.8: Bhagavato pana sāvako tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā tasmiṁyeva bhave parinibbāyati.
an4.123:1.9: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhave, viseso ayaṁ adhippayāso idaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ sutavato ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanena, yadidaṁ gatiyā upapattiyā sati.
an4.123:2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ
an4.123:2.1_1: cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.123:2.2: So tadassādeti, taṁ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati.
an4.123:2.3: Tattha ṭhito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihārī aparihīno kālaṁ kurumāno ābhassarānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an4.123:2.4: Ābhassarānaṁ, bhikkhave, devānaṁ dve kappā āyuppamāṇaṁ.
an4.123:2.5: Tattha puthujjano yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā nirayampi gacchati tiracchānayonimpi gacchati pettivisayampi gacchati.
an4.123:2.6: Bhagavato pana sāvako tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā tasmiṁyeva bhave parinibbāyati.
an4.123:2.7: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhave, viseso ayaṁ adhippayāso idaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ sutavato ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanena, yadidaṁ gatiyā upapattiyā sati.
an4.123:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati
an4.123:3.1_1: sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedeti yaṁ taṁ ariyā ācikkhanti: ‘upekkhako
an4.123:3.1_2: satimā sukhavihārī’ti tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.123:3.2: So tadassādeti, taṁ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati.
an4.123:3.3: Tattha ṭhito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihārī aparihīno, kālaṁ kurumāno subhakiṇhānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an4.123:3.4: Subhakiṇhānaṁ, bhikkhave, devānaṁ cattāro kappā āyuppamāṇaṁ.
an4.123:3.5: Tattha puthujjano yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā nirayampi gacchati tiracchānayonimpi gacchati pettivisayampi gacchati.
an4.123:3.6: Bhagavato pana sāvako tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā tasmiṁyeva bhave parinibbāyati.
an4.123:3.7: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhave, viseso ayaṁ adhippayāso idaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ sutavato ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanena, yadidaṁ gatiyā upapattiyā sati.
an4.123:4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā
an4.123:4.1_1: pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ catutthaṁ
an4.123:4.2: So tadassādeti, taṁ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati.
an4.123:4.3: Tattha ṭhito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihārī aparihīno kālaṁ kurumāno vehapphalānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an4.123:4.4: Vehapphalānaṁ, bhikkhave, devānaṁ pañca kappasatāni āyuppamāṇaṁ.
an4.123:4.5: Tattha puthujjano yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā nirayampi gacchati tiracchānayonimpi gacchati pettivisayampi gacchati.
an4.123:4.6: Bhagavato pana sāvako tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā tasmiṁyeva bhave parinibbāyati.
an4.123:4.7: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhave, viseso ayaṁ adhippayāso idaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ sutavato ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanena, yadidaṁ gatiyā upapattiyā sati.
an4.123:4.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4.124:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.124:1.4_0: So yadeva tattha hoti rūpagataṁ vedanāgataṁ saññāgataṁ saṅkhāragataṁ viññāṇagataṁ,
an4.124:1.4_1: te dhamme aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato palokato
an4.124:1.5: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā suddhāvāsānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an4.124:2.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.124:2.2_0: So yadeva tattha hoti rūpagataṁ vedanāgataṁ saññāgataṁ saṅkhāragataṁ viññāṇagataṁ,
an4.124:2.2_1: te dhamme aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato palokato
an4.124:2.3: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā suddhāvāsānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an4.124:2.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4.125:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati,
an4.125:1.3_1: tathā dutiyaṁ tathā tatiyaṁ tathā catutthaṁ. Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya
an4.125:1.3_2: sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena
an4.125:1.4: So tadassādeti, taṁ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati.
an4.125:1.5: Tattha ṭhito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihārī aparihīno kālaṁ kurumāno brahmakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an4.125:1.7: Tattha puthujjano yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā nirayampi gacchati tiracchānayonimpi gacchati pettivisayampi gacchati.
an4.125:1.8: Bhagavato pana sāvako tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā tasmiṁyeva bhave parinibbāyati.
an4.125:1.9: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhave, viseso ayaṁ adhippayāso idaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ sutavato ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanena, yadidaṁ gatiyā upapattiyā sati.
an4.125:2.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo karuṇāsahagatena cetasā …pe…
an4.125:2.3_0: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṁ tathā tatiyaṁ
an4.125:2.3_1: tathā catutthaṁ. Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ upekkhāsahagatena
an4.125:2.3_2: cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.
an4.125:2.4: So tadassādeti, taṁ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati.
an4.125:2.5: Tattha ṭhito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihārī aparihīno kālaṁ kurumāno ābhassarānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an4.125:2.6: Ābhassarānaṁ, bhikkhave, devānaṁ dve kappā āyuppamāṇaṁ …pe… subhakiṇhānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an4.125:2.7: Subhakiṇhānaṁ, bhikkhave, devānaṁ cattāro kappā āyuppamāṇaṁ …pe… vehapphalānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an4.125:2.8: Vehapphalānaṁ, bhikkhave, devānaṁ pañca kappasatāni āyuppamāṇaṁ.
an4.125:2.9: Tattha puthujjano yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā nirayampi gacchati tiracchānayonimpi gacchati pettivisayampi gacchati.
an4.125:2.10: Bhagavato pana sāvako tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā tasmiṁyeva bhave parinibbāyati.
an4.125:2.11: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhave, viseso ayaṁ adhippayāso idaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ sutavato ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanena, yadidaṁ gatiyā upapattiyā sati.
an4.125:2.12: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4.126:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati,

an4.127:1.1: “Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvā cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā pātubhavanti.
an4.127:1.3_0: Yadā, bhikkhave, bodhisatto tusitā kāyā cavitvā sato sampajāno mātukucchiṁ okkamati,
an4.127:1.3_1: atha sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya
an4.127:1.3_2: appamāṇo uḷāro obhāso pātubhavati atikkammeva devānaṁ devānubhāvaṁ.
an4.127:1.4_0: Yāpi tā lokantarikā aghā asaṁvutā andhakārā andhakāratimisā yatthapimesaṁ candimasūriyānaṁ
an4.127:1.4_1: evaṁmahiddhikānaṁ evaṁmahānubhāvānaṁ ābhā nānubhonti, tatthapi appamāṇo uḷāro obhāso
an4.127:1.5: Yepi tattha sattā upapannā tepi tenobhāsena aññamaññaṁ sañjānanti:
an4.127:1.7: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvā ayaṁ paṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo pātubhavati.
an4.127:2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, yadā bodhisatto sato sampajāno mātukucchimhā nikkhamati,
an4.127:2.1_1: atha sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya
an4.127:2.1_2: appamāṇo uḷāro obhāso pātubhavati atikkammeva devānaṁ devānubhāvaṁ.
an4.127:2.2_0: Yāpi tā lokantarikā aghā asaṁvutā andhakārā andhakāratimisā yatthapimesaṁ candimasūriyānaṁ
an4.127:2.2_1: evaṁmahiddhikānaṁ evaṁmahānubhāvānaṁ ābhā nānubhonti, tatthapi appamāṇo uḷāro obhāso
an4.127:2.3: Yepi tattha sattā upapannā tepi tenobhāsena aññamaññaṁ sañjānanti:
an4.127:2.5: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvā ayaṁ dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo pātubhavati.
an4.127:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, yadā tathāgato anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambujjhati,
an4.127:3.1_1: atha sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya
an4.127:3.1_2: appamāṇo uḷāro obhāso pātubhavati atikkammeva devānaṁ devānubhāvaṁ.
an4.127:3.2_0: Yāpi tā lokantarikā aghā asaṁvutā andhakārā andhakāratimisā yatthapimesaṁ candimasūriyānaṁ
an4.127:3.2_1: evaṁmahiddhikānaṁ evaṁmahānubhāvānaṁ ābhā nānubhonti, tatthapi appamāṇo uḷāro obhāso
an4.127:3.3: Yepi tattha sattā upapannā tepi tenobhāsena aññamaññaṁ sañjānanti:
an4.127:3.5: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvā ayaṁ tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo pātubhavati.
an4.127:4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, yadā tathāgato anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavatteti, atha sadevake
an4.127:4.1_1: loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya appamāṇo uḷāro
an4.127:4.2_0: Yāpi tā lokantarikā aghā asaṁvutā andhakārā andhakāratimisā yatthapimesaṁ candimasūriyānaṁ
an4.127:4.2_1: evaṁmahiddhikānaṁ evaṁmahānubhāvānaṁ ābhā nānubhonti, tatthapi appamāṇo uḷāro obhāso
an4.127:4.3: Yepi tattha sattā upapannā tepi tenobhāsena aññamaññaṁ sañjānanti:
an4.127:4.5: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvā ayaṁ catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo pātubhavati.
an4.127:4.6: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvā ime cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā pātubhavantī”ti.
an4.128:1.1: “Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvā cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā pātubhavanti.
an4.128:1.4: sā tathāgatena anālaye dhamme desiyamāne sussūsati sotaṁ odahati aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhapeti.
an4.128:1.5: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvā ayaṁ paṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo pātubhavati.
an4.128:2.2: Sā tathāgatena mānavinaye dhamme desiyamāne sussūsati sotaṁ odahati aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhapeti.
an4.128:2.3: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvā ayaṁ dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo pātubhavati.
an4.128:3.2: Sā tathāgatena opasamike dhamme desiyamāne sussūsati sotaṁ odahati aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhapeti.
an4.128:3.3: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvā ayaṁ tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo pātubhavati.
an4.128:4.2: Sā tathāgatena avijjāvinaye dhamme desiyamāne sussūsati sotaṁ odahati aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhapeti.
an4.128:4.3: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvā ayaṁ catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo pātubhavati.
an4.128:4.4: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvā ime cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā pātubhavantī”ti.
