an4.135:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo anavajjena bahulaṁ kāyakammena samannāgato hoti, appaṁ sāvajjena;
an4.135:4.3: anavajjena bahulaṁ vacīkammena samannāgato hoti, appaṁ sāvajjena;
an4.135:4.4: anavajjena bahulaṁ manokammena samannāgato hoti, appaṁ sāvajjena.
an4.135:4.5: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo appavajjo hoti.
an4.135:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo anavajjena kāyakammena samannāgato hoti, anavajjena vacīkammena samannāgato hoti, anavajjena manokammena samannāgato hoti.
an4.135:5.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo anavajjo hoti.
an4.135:5.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4.136:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sīlesu na paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṁ na paripūrakārī, paññāya na paripūrakārī.
an4.136:2.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṁ na paripūrakārī, paññāya na paripūrakārī.
an4.136:3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṁ paripūrakārī, paññāya na paripūrakārī.
an4.136:4.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṁ paripūrakārī, paññāya paripūrakārī.
an4.136:4.2: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4.137:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na sīlagaru hoti na sīlādhipateyyo, na samādhigaru hoti na samādhādhipateyyo, na paññāgaru hoti na paññādhipateyyo.
an4.137:2.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sīlagaru hoti sīlādhipateyyo, na samādhigaru hoti na samādhādhipateyyo, na paññāgaru hoti na paññādhipateyyo.
an4.137:3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sīlagaru hoti sīlādhipateyyo, samādhigaru hoti samādhādhipateyyo, na paññāgaru hoti na paññādhipateyyo.
an4.137:4.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sīlagaru hoti sīlādhipateyyo, samādhigaru hoti samādhādhipateyyo, paññāgaru hoti paññādhipateyyo.
an4.137:4.2: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4.138:2.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo nikaṭṭhakāyo hoti anikaṭṭhacitto?
an4.138:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevati.
an4.138:2.3: So tattha kāmavitakkampi vitakketi byāpādavitakkampi vitakketi vihiṁsāvitakkampi vitakketi.
an4.138:2.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nikaṭṭhakāyo hoti anikaṭṭhacitto.
an4.138:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo anikaṭṭhakāyo hoti nikaṭṭhacitto?
an4.138:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo naheva kho araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevati.
an4.138:3.3: So tattha nekkhammavitakkampi vitakketi abyāpādavitakkampi vitakketi avihiṁsāvitakkampi vitakketi.
an4.138:3.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo anikaṭṭhakāyo hoti nikaṭṭhacitto.
an4.138:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo anikaṭṭhakāyo ca hoti anikaṭṭhacitto ca?
an4.138:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo naheva kho araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevati.
an4.138:4.3: So tattha kāmavitakkampi vitakketi byāpādavitakkampi vitakketi vihiṁsāvitakkampi vitakketi.
an4.138:4.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo anikaṭṭhakāyo ca hoti anikaṭṭhacitto ca.
an4.138:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo nikaṭṭhakāyo ca hoti nikaṭṭhacitto ca?
an4.138:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevati.
an4.138:5.3: So tattha nekkhammavitakkampi vitakketi abyāpādavitakkampi vitakketi avihiṁsāvitakkampi vitakketi.
an4.138:5.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nikaṭṭhakāyo ca hoti nikaṭṭhacitto ca.
an4.138:5.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4.139:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco dhammakathiko appañca bhāsati asahitañca;
an4.139:1.4: parisā cassa na kusalā hoti sahitāsahitassa.
an4.139:1.5: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, dhammakathiko evarūpāya parisāya dhammakathikotveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
an4.139:2.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco dhammakathiko appañca bhāsati sahitañca;
an4.139:2.3: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, dhammakathiko evarūpāya parisāya dhammakathikotveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
an4.139:3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco dhammakathiko bahuñca bhāsati asahitañca;
an4.139:3.2: parisā cassa na kusalā hoti sahitāsahitassa.
an4.139:3.3: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, dhammakathiko evarūpāya parisāya dhammakathikotveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
an4.139:4.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco dhammakathiko bahuñca bhāsati sahitañca;
an4.139:4.3: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, dhammakathiko evarūpāya parisāya dhammakathikotveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
an4.140:1.3: Atthi, bhikkhave, vādī atthato pariyādānaṁ gacchati, no byañjanato;
an4.140:1.4: atthi, bhikkhave, vādī byañjanato pariyādānaṁ gacchati, no atthato;
an4.140:1.5: atthi, bhikkhave, vādī atthato ca byañjanato ca pariyādānaṁ gacchati;
an4.140:1.6: atthi, bhikkhave, vādī nevatthato no byañjanato pariyādānaṁ gacchati.
an4.140:1.8: Aṭṭhānametaṁ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṁ catūhi paṭisambhidāhi samannāgato atthato vā byañjanato vā pariyādānaṁ gaccheyyā”ti.
an4.141:1.5: Etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, imāsaṁ catunnaṁ ābhānaṁ yadidaṁ paññābhā”ti.
an4.142:1.5: Etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, imāsaṁ catunnaṁ pabhānaṁ yadidaṁ paññāpabhā”ti.
an4.143:1.5: Etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, imesaṁ catunnaṁ ālokānaṁ yadidaṁ paññāloko”ti.
an4.144:1.5: Etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, imesaṁ catunnaṁ obhāsānaṁ yadidaṁ paññobhāso”ti.
an4.145:1.5: Etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, imesaṁ catunnaṁ pajjotānaṁ yadidaṁ paññāpajjoto”ti.
an4.146:1.3: Kālena dhammassavanaṁ, kālena dhammasākacchā, kālena sammasanā, kālena vipassanā—
an4.147:1.1: “Cattārome, bhikkhave, kālā sammā bhāviyamānā sammā anuparivattiyamānā anupubbena āsavānaṁ khayaṁ pāpenti.
an4.147:1.3: Kālena dhammassavanaṁ, kālena dhammasākacchā, kālena sammasanā, kālena vipassanā—
an4.147:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro kālā sammā bhāviyamānā sammā anuparivattiyamānā anupubbena āsavānaṁ khayaṁ pāpenti.
an4.147:2.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, uparipabbate thullaphusitake deve vassante taṁ udakaṁ yathāninnaṁ
an4.147:2.1_2: kusobbhe paripūrenti; kusobbhā paripūrā mahāsobbhe paripūrenti; mahāsobbhā paripūrā
an4.147:2.1_3: kunnadiyo paripūrenti; kunnadiyo paripūrā mahānadiyo paripūrenti; mahānadiyo paripūrā
an4.147:2.2: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, ime cattāro kālā sammā bhāviyamānā sammā anuparivattiyamānā anupubbena āsavānaṁ khayaṁ pāpentī”ti.
an4.148:1.3: Musāvādo, pisuṇā vācā, pharusā vācā, samphappalāpo—
an4.149:1.3: Saccavācā, apisuṇā vācā, saṇhā vācā, mantabhāsā—
an4.156:1.3: Yadā, bhikkhave, kappo saṁvaṭṭati, taṁ na sukaraṁ saṅkhātuṁ—
an4.156:1.4: ettakāni vassānīti vā, ettakāni vassasatānīti vā, ettakāni vassasahassānīti vā, ettakāni vassasatasahassānīti vā.
an4.156:2.1: Yadā, bhikkhave, kappo saṁvaṭṭo tiṭṭhati, taṁ na sukaraṁ saṅkhātuṁ—
an4.156:2.2: ettakāni vassānīti vā, ettakāni vassasatānīti vā, ettakāni vassasahassānīti vā, ettakāni vassasatasahassānīti vā.
an4.156:3.1: Yadā, bhikkhave, kappo vivaṭṭati, taṁ na sukaraṁ saṅkhātuṁ—
an4.156:3.2: ettakāni vassānīti vā, ettakāni vassasatānīti vā, ettakāni vassasahassānīti vā, ettakāni vassasatasahassānīti vā.
an4.156:4.1: Yadā, bhikkhave, kappo vivaṭṭo tiṭṭhati, taṁ na sukaraṁ saṅkhātuṁ—
an4.156:4.2: ettakāni vassānīti vā, ettakāni vassasatānīti vā, ettakāni vassasahassānīti vā, ettakāni vassasatasahassānīti vā.
an4.156:4.3: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri kappassa asaṅkhyeyyānī”ti.
an4.157:1.3: Kāyiko ca rogo cetasiko ca rogo.
an4.157:1.4_0: Dissanti, bhikkhave, sattā kāyikena rogena ekampi vassaṁ ārogyaṁ paṭijānamānā, dvepi
an4.157:1.4_1: vassāni ārogyaṁ paṭijānamānā, tīṇipi vassāni ārogyaṁ paṭijānamānā, cattāripi vassāni
an4.157:1.4_2: ārogyaṁ paṭijānamānā, pañcapi vassāni ārogyaṁ paṭijānamānā, dasapi vassāni ārogyaṁ
an4.157:1.4_3: paṭijānamānā, vīsatipi vassāni ārogyaṁ paṭijānamānā, tiṁsampi vassāni ārogyaṁ paṭijānamānā,
an4.157:1.4_4: cattārīsampi vassāni ārogyaṁ paṭijānamānā, paññāsampi vassāni ārogyaṁ paṭijānamānā,
an4.157:1.5: Te, bhikkhave, sattā sudullabhā lokasmiṁ ye cetasikena rogena muhuttampi ārogyaṁ paṭijānanti, aññatra khīṇāsavehi.
an4.157:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mahiccho hoti vighātavā asantuṭṭho itarītaracīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārena.
an4.157:2.5: So uṭṭhahati ghaṭati vāyamati anavaññappaṭilābhāya lābhasakkārasilokappaṭilābhāya.
an4.157:2.6: So saṅkhāya kulāni upasaṅkamati, saṅkhāya nisīdati, saṅkhāya dhammaṁ bhāsati, saṅkhāya uccārapassāvaṁ sandhāreti.
an4.157:2.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro pabbajitassa rogā.
an4.157:3.2_1: na pāpikaṁ icchaṁ paṇidahissāma anavaññappaṭilābhāya lābhasakkārasilokappaṭilābhāya,
an4.157:3.2_2: na uṭṭhahissāma na ghaṭessāma na vāyamissāma anavaññappaṭilābhāya lābhasakkārasilokappaṭilābhāya,
an4.157:3.2_3: khamā bhavissāma sītassa uṇhassa jighacchāya pipāsāya ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānaṁ
an4.157:3.2_4: duruttānaṁ durāgatānaṁ vacanapathānaṁ, uppannānaṁ sārīrikānaṁ vedanānaṁ dukkhānaṁ
an4.157:3.2_5: tibbānaṁ kharānaṁ kaṭukānaṁ asātānaṁ amanāpānaṁ pāṇaharānaṁ adhivāsakajātikā bhavissāmā’ti.
an4.158:1.1: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an4.158:1.3: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
an4.158:2.1: “Yo hi koci, āvuso, bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā cattāro dhamme attani samanupassati, niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ:
an4.158:2.5: Rāgavepullattaṁ, dosavepullattaṁ, mohavepullattaṁ, gambhīresu kho panassa ṭhānāṭhānesu paññācakkhu na kamati.
an4.158:2.6: Yo hi koci, āvuso, bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā ime cattāro dhamme attani samanupassati, niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ:
an4.158:3.1: Yo hi koci, āvuso, bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā cattāro dhamme attani samanupassati, niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ:
an4.158:3.5: Rāgatanuttaṁ, dosatanuttaṁ, mohatanuttaṁ, gambhīresu kho panassa ṭhānāṭhānesu paññācakkhu kamati.
an4.158:3.6: Yo hi koci, āvuso, bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā ime cattāro dhamme attani samanupassati, niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ:
an4.159:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
an4.159:1.3: Atha kho aññatarā bhikkhunī aññataraṁ purisaṁ āmantesi:
an4.159:1.4: “ehi tvaṁ, ambho purisa, yenayyo ānando tenupasaṅkama; upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena ayyassa ānandassa pāde sirasā vanda:
an4.159:1.6: Sā ayyassa ānandassa pāde sirasā vandatī’ti. Evañca vadehi:
an4.159:1.7: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, ayyo ānando yena bhikkhunupassayo yena sā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā’”ti.
an4.159:1.8_0: “Evaṁ, ayye”ti kho so puriso tassā bhikkhuniyā paṭissutvā yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
an4.159:1.8_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno
an4.159:1.8_2: kho so puriso āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
an4.159:2.2: Sā āyasmato ānandassa pāde sirasā vandati, evañca vadeti:
an4.159:2.3: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, āyasmā ānando yena bhikkhunupassayo yena sā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā’”ti.
an4.159:3.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena bhikkhunupassayo yena sā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami.
an4.159:3.2: Addasā kho sā bhikkhunī āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
an4.159:3.4: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena sā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi. Nisajja kho āyasmā ānando taṁ bhikkhuniṁ etadavoca:
an4.159:4.3: Taṇhāsambhūto ayaṁ, bhagini, kāyo taṇhaṁ nissāya.
an4.159:4.5: Mānasambhūto ayaṁ, bhagini, kāyo mānaṁ nissāya.
an4.159:5.2: Āhāro pahātabbo’ti, iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ.
an4.159:5.4: Idha, bhagini, bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṁ āhāreti:
an4.159:5.5_0: ‘neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya, yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā
an4.159:5.5_1: yāpanāya vihiṁsūparatiyā brahmacariyānuggahāya. Iti purāṇañca vedanaṁ paṭihaṅkhāmi,
an4.159:5.5_2: navañca vedanaṁ na uppādessāmi. Yātrā ca me bhavissati anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cā’ti.
an4.159:5.6: So aparena samayena āhāraṁ nissāya āhāraṁ pajahati.
an4.159:5.7: ‘Āhārasambhūto ayaṁ, bhagini, kāyo āhāraṁ nissāya āhāro pahātabbo’ti,
an4.159:5.8: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
an4.159:6.2: Taṇhā pahātabbā’ti, iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ.
an4.159:6.5: ‘itthannāmo kira bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī’ti.
an4.159:6.7: ‘kudāssu nāma ahampi āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissāmī’ti.
an4.159:6.8: So aparena samayena taṇhaṁ nissāya taṇhaṁ pajahati.
an4.159:6.9: ‘Taṇhāsambhūto ayaṁ, bhagini, kāyo taṇhaṁ nissāya taṇhā pahātabbā’ti,
an4.159:6.10: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
an4.159:7.2: Māno pahātabbo’ti, iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ.
an4.159:7.5: ‘itthannāmo kira bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī’ti.
an4.159:7.7: ‘so hi nāma āyasmā āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissati;
an4.159:7.9: So aparena samayena mānaṁ nissāya mānaṁ pajahati.
an4.159:7.10: ‘Mānasambhūto ayaṁ, bhagini, kāyo, mānaṁ nissāya māno pahātabbo’ti,
an4.159:7.11: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
an4.159:9.1: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī mañcakā vuṭṭhahitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā āyasmato ānandassa pādesu sirasā nipatitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
an4.159:9.2: “accayo maṁ, bhante, accagamā, yathābālaṁ yathāmūḷhaṁ yathāakusalaṁ, yāhaṁ evamakāsiṁ.
an4.159:9.3: Tassā me, bhante, ayyo ānando accayaṁ accayato paṭiggaṇhātu, āyatiṁ saṁvarāyā”ti.
an4.159:9.4: “Taggha taṁ, bhagini, accayo accagamā, yathābālaṁ yathāmūḷhaṁ yathāakusalaṁ, yā tvaṁ evamakāsi.
an4.159:9.5: Yato ca kho tvaṁ, bhagini, accayaṁ accayato disvā yathādhammaṁ paṭikarosi, taṁ te mayaṁ paṭiggaṇhāma.
an4.159:9.6: Vuddhi hesā, bhagini, ariyassa vinaye yo accayaṁ accayato disvā yathādhammaṁ paṭikaroti āyatiṁ saṁvaraṁ āpajjatī”ti.
an4.160:1.1: “Sugato vā, bhikkhave, loke tiṭṭhamāno sugatavinayo vā tadassa bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ.
an4.160:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā.
an4.160:3.2: So dhammaṁ deseti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ, kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ pakāseti.
an4.160:3.4: Evaṁ sugato vā, bhikkhave, loke tiṭṭhamāno sugatavinayo vā tadassa bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānanti.
an4.160:4.1: Cattārome, bhikkhave, dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattanti.
an4.160:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhū duggahitaṁ suttantaṁ pariyāpuṇanti dunnikkhittehi padabyañjanehi.
an4.160:4.4: Dunnikkhittassa, bhikkhave, padabyañjanassa atthopi dunnayo hoti.
an4.160:4.5: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an4.160:5.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū dubbacā honti dovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgatā akkhamā appadakkhiṇaggāhino anusāsaniṁ.
an4.160:5.2: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an4.160:6.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā, te na sakkaccaṁ suttantaṁ paraṁ vācenti.
an4.160:6.2: Tesaṁ accayena chinnamūlako suttanto hoti appaṭisaraṇo.
an4.160:6.3: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an4.160:7.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, therā bhikkhū bāhulikā honti sāthalikā, okkamane pubbaṅgamā,
an4.160:7.1_1: paviveke nikkhittadhurā, na vīriyaṁ ārabhanti appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya
an4.160:7.3: Sāpi hoti bāhulikā sāthalikā, okkamane pubbaṅgamā, paviveke nikkhittadhurā, na vīriyaṁ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an4.160:7.4: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an4.160:7.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattantīti.
an4.160:8.1: Cattārome, bhikkhave, dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattanti.
an4.160:8.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhū suggahitaṁ suttantaṁ pariyāpuṇanti sunikkhittehi padabyañjanehi.
an4.160:8.4: Sunikkhittassa, bhikkhave, padabyañjanassa atthopi sunayo hoti.
an4.160:8.5: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo dhammo saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an4.160:9.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū suvacā honti sovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgatā khamā padakkhiṇaggāhino anusāsaniṁ.
an4.160:9.2: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an4.160:10.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā, te sakkaccaṁ suttantaṁ paraṁ vācenti.
an4.160:10.2: Tesaṁ accayena nacchinnamūlako suttanto hoti sappaṭisaraṇo.
an4.160:10.3: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an4.160:11.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, therā bhikkhū na bāhulikā honti na sāthalikā, okkamane nikkhittadhurā,
an4.160:11.1_1: paviveke pubbaṅgamā, vīriyaṁ ārabhanti appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya
an4.160:11.3: Sāpi hoti na bāhulikā na sāthalikā, okkamane nikkhittadhurā, paviveke pubbaṅgamā, vīriyaṁ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an4.160:11.4: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an4.160:11.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattantī”ti.
an4.162:2.1: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā?
an4.162:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyāpi tibbarāgajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṁ rāgajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
an4.162:2.3: Pakatiyāpi tibbadosajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṁ dosajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
an4.162:2.4: Pakatiyāpi tibbamohajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṁ mohajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
an4.162:2.7: So imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ muduttā dandhaṁ ānantariyaṁ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an4.162:2.8: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā.
an4.162:3.1: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā?
an4.162:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyāpi tibbarāgajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṁ rāgajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
an4.162:3.3: Pakatiyāpi tibbadosajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṁ dosajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
an4.162:3.4: Pakatiyāpi tibbamohajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṁ mohajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
an4.162:3.7: So imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ adhimattattā khippaṁ ānantariyaṁ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an4.162:3.8: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā.
an4.162:4.1: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā?
an4.162:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyāpi na tibbarāgajātiko hoti, nābhikkhaṇaṁ rāgajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
an4.162:4.3: Pakatiyāpi na tibbadosajātiko hoti, nābhikkhaṇaṁ dosajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
an4.162:4.4: Pakatiyāpi na tibbamohajātiko hoti, nābhikkhaṇaṁ mohajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
an4.162:4.7: So imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ muduttā dandhaṁ ānantariyaṁ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an4.162:4.8: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā.
an4.162:5.1: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā?
an4.162:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyāpi na tibbarāgajātiko hoti, nābhikkhaṇaṁ rāgajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
an4.162:5.3: Pakatiyāpi na tibbadosajātiko hoti, nābhikkhaṇaṁ dosajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
an4.162:5.4: Pakatiyāpi na tibbamohajātiko hoti, nābhikkhaṇaṁ mohajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
an4.162:5.7: So imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ adhimattattā khippaṁ ānantariyaṁ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an4.162:5.8: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā.
an4.163:2.1: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā?
an4.163:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asubhānupassī kāye viharati, āhāre paṭikūlasaññī, sabbaloke anabhiratisaññī, sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassī;
an4.163:2.3: maraṇasaññā kho panassa ajjhattaṁ sūpaṭṭhitā hoti.
an4.163:2.4: So imāni pañca sekhabalāni upanissāya viharati—
an4.163:2.8: So imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ muduttā dandhaṁ ānantariyaṁ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an4.163:2.9: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā.
an4.163:3.1: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā?
an4.163:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asubhānupassī kāye viharati, āhāre paṭikūlasaññī, sabbaloke anabhiratisaññī, sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassī;
an4.163:3.3: maraṇasaññā kho panassa ajjhattaṁ sūpaṭṭhitā hoti.
an4.163:3.4: So imāni pañca sekhabalāni upanissāya viharati—
an4.163:3.8: So imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ adhimattattā khippaṁ ānantariyaṁ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an4.163:3.9: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā.
an4.163:4.1: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā?
an4.163:4.2: Idha bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
an4.163:4.3: vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
an4.163:4.4_0: pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedeti
an4.163:4.4_1: yaṁ taṁ ariyā ācikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
an4.163:4.5: sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.163:4.6: So imāni pañca sekhabalāni upanissāya viharati—
an4.163:4.10: So imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ muduttā dandhaṁ ānantariyaṁ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an4.163:4.11: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā.
an4.163:5.1: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā?
an4.163:5.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ
an4.163:5.2_1: vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati …pe… dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe…
an4.163:5.2_2: tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.163:5.3: So imāni pañca sekhabalāni upanissāya viharati—
an4.163:5.7: So imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ adhimattattā khippaṁ ānantariyaṁ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an4.163:5.8: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā.
an4.164:1.3: Akkhamā paṭipadā, khamā paṭipadā, damā paṭipadā, samā paṭipadā.
an4.164:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco akkosantaṁ paccakkosati, rosantaṁ paṭirosati, bhaṇḍantaṁ paṭibhaṇḍati.
an4.164:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco akkosantaṁ na paccakkosati, rosantaṁ na paṭirosati, bhaṇḍantaṁ na paṭibhaṇḍati.
an4.164:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī;
an4.164:3.3_0: yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā
an4.164:3.3_1: dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ, tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjati; rakkhati cakkhundriyaṁ; cakkhundriye saṁvaraṁ āpajjati.
an4.164:3.8: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī;
an4.164:3.9_0: yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ manindriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā
an4.164:3.9_1: dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ, tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjati; rakkhati manindriyaṁ; manindriye saṁvaraṁ āpajjati.
an4.164:4.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannaṁ kāmavitakkaṁ nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti sameti
an4.164:4.2_1: byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti; uppannaṁ byāpādavitakkaṁ …pe… uppannaṁ vihiṁsāvitakkaṁ
an4.164:4.2_2: … uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti sameti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti.
an4.165:1.3: Akkhamā paṭipadā, khamā paṭipadā, damā paṭipadā, samā paṭipadā.
an4.165:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco akkhamo hoti sītassa uṇhassa jighacchāya pipāsāya, ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānaṁ
an4.165:2.2_1: duruttānaṁ durāgatānaṁ vacanapathānaṁ uppannānaṁ sārīrikānaṁ vedanānaṁ dukkhānaṁ
an4.165:2.2_2: tibbānaṁ kharānaṁ kaṭukānaṁ asātānaṁ amanāpānaṁ pāṇaharānaṁ anadhivāsakajātiko hoti.
an4.165:3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassa jighacchāya pipāsāya, ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānaṁ
an4.165:3.2_1: duruttānaṁ durāgatānaṁ vacanapathānaṁ uppannānaṁ sārīrikānaṁ vedanānaṁ dukkhānaṁ
an4.165:3.2_2: tibbānaṁ kharānaṁ kaṭukānaṁ asātānaṁ amanāpānaṁ pāṇaharānaṁ adhivāsakajātiko hoti.
an4.165:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti …pe…
an4.165:4.7: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī;
an4.165:4.8_0: yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ manindriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā
an4.165:4.8_1: dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ, tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjati; rakkhati manindriyaṁ; manindriye saṁvaraṁ āpajjati.
an4.165:5.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannaṁ kāmavitakkaṁ nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti sameti
an4.165:5.2_1: byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti, uppannaṁ byāpādavitakkaṁ …pe… uppannaṁ vihiṁsāvitakkaṁ
an4.165:5.2_2: … uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti sameti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti.
an4.166:2.1_0: Tatra, bhikkhave, yāyaṁ paṭipadā dukkhā dandhābhiññā, ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭipadā ubhayeneva
an4.166:2.1_1: hīnā akkhāyati. Yampāyaṁ paṭipadā dukkhā, imināpāyaṁ hīnā akkhāyati; yampāyaṁ paṭipadā
an4.166:2.2: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭipadā ubhayeneva hīnā akkhāyati.
an4.166:3.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yāyaṁ paṭipadā dukkhā khippābhiññā, ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭipadā dukkhattā hīnā akkhāyati.
an4.166:4.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yāyaṁ paṭipadā sukhā dandhābhiññā, ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭipadā dandhattā hīnā akkhāyati.
an4.166:5.1_0: Tatra, bhikkhave, yāyaṁ paṭipadā sukhā khippābhiññā, ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭipadā ubhayeneva
an4.166:5.1_1: paṇītā akkhāyati. Yampāyaṁ paṭipadā sukhā, imināpāyaṁ paṇītā akkhāyati; yampāyaṁ
an4.166:5.2: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭipadā ubhayeneva paṇītā akkhāyati.
an4.167:1.1: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā mahāmoggallānena saddhiṁ sammodi.
an4.167:1.2: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ etadavoca:
an4.167:2.8: Imāsaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ paṭipadānaṁ katamaṁ te paṭipadaṁ āgamma anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuttan”ti?
an4.167:3.3: Dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā, dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā, sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā, sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā.
an4.167:3.5: Imāsaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ paṭipadānaṁ yāyaṁ paṭipadā dukkhā khippābhiññā, imaṁ me paṭipadaṁ āgamma anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuttan”ti.
an4.168:1.1: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā sāriputtena saddhiṁ sammodi.
an4.168:1.2: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
an4.168:2.8: Imāsaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ paṭipadānaṁ katamaṁ te paṭipadaṁ āgamma anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuttan”ti?
an4.168:3.3: Dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā, dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā, sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā, sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā.
an4.168:3.5: Imāsaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ paṭipadānaṁ yāyaṁ paṭipadā sukhā khippābhiññā, imaṁ me paṭipadaṁ āgamma anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuttan”ti.
an4.169:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo diṭṭheva dhamme sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:1.4: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo kāyassa bhedā sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo diṭṭheva dhamme asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo kāyassa bhedā asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:2.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo diṭṭheva dhamme sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti?
an4.169:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asubhānupassī kāye viharati, āhāre paṭikūlasaññī, sabbaloke anabhiratisaññī, sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassī.
an4.169:2.3: Maraṇasaññā kho panassa ajjhattaṁ sūpaṭṭhitā hoti.
an4.169:2.4: So imāni pañca sekhabalāni upanissāya viharati—
an4.169:2.8: So imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ adhimattattā diṭṭheva dhamme sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:2.9: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo diṭṭheva dhamme sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo kāyassa bhedā sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti?
an4.169:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asubhānupassī kāye viharati, āhāre paṭikūlasaññī, sabbaloke anabhiratisaññī, sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassī.
an4.169:3.3: Maraṇasaññā kho panassa ajjhattaṁ sūpaṭṭhitā hoti.
an4.169:3.4: So imāni pañca sekhabalāni upanissāya viharati—
an4.169:3.8: So imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ muduttā kāyassa bhedā sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:3.9: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo kāyassa bhedā sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo diṭṭheva dhamme asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti?
an4.169:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ …pe… dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.169:4.3: So imāni pañca sekhabalāni upanissāya viharati—
an4.169:4.7: So imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ adhimattattā diṭṭheva dhamme asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:4.8: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo diṭṭheva dhamme asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo kāyassa bhedā asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti?
an4.169:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ …pe… dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.169:5.3: So imāni pañca sekhabalāni upanissāya viharati—
an4.169:5.6: So imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ muduttā kāyassa bhedā asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:5.7: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo kāyassa bhedā asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:5.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4.170:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
an4.170:1.3: Tatra kho āyasmā ānando bhikkhū āmantesi:
an4.170:1.5: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato ānandassa paccassosuṁ.
an4.170:2.1: “Yo hi koci, āvuso, bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā mama santike arahattappattiṁ byākaroti, sabbo so catūhi maggehi, etesaṁ vā aññatarena.
an4.170:3.2: Idha, āvuso, bhikkhu samathapubbaṅgamaṁ vipassanaṁ bhāveti.
an4.170:3.3: Tassa samathapubbaṅgamaṁ vipassanaṁ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati.
an4.170:3.4: So taṁ maggaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
an4.170:3.5: Tassa taṁ maggaṁ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saṁyojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
an4.170:4.1: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṁ samathaṁ bhāveti.
an4.170:4.2: Tassa vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṁ samathaṁ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati.
an4.170:4.3: So taṁ maggaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
an4.170:4.4: Tassa taṁ maggaṁ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saṁyojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
an4.170:5.1: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu samathavipassanaṁ yuganaddhaṁ bhāveti.
an4.170:5.2: Tassa samathavipassanaṁ yuganaddhaṁ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati.
an4.170:5.3: So taṁ maggaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
an4.170:5.4: Tassa taṁ maggaṁ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saṁyojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
an4.170:6.1: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhuno dhammuddhaccaviggahitaṁ mānasaṁ hoti.
an4.170:6.2: Hoti so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ taṁ cittaṁ ajjhattameva santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
an4.170:6.4: So taṁ maggaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
an4.170:6.5: Tassa taṁ maggaṁ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saṁyojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
an4.170:7.1: Yo hi koci, āvuso, bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā mama santike arahattappattiṁ byākaroti, sabbo so imehi catūhi maggehi, etesaṁ vā aññatarenā”ti.
an4.171:1.1: “Kāye vā, bhikkhave, sati kāyasañcetanāhetu uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ.
an4.171:1.2: Vācāya vā, bhikkhave, sati vacīsañcetanāhetu uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ.
an4.171:1.3: Mane vā, bhikkhave, sati manosañcetanāhetu uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ avijjāpaccayāva.
an4.171:2.1: Sāmaṁ vā taṁ, bhikkhave, kāyasaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharoti, yaṁpaccayāssa taṁ uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ.
an4.171:2.2: Pare vāssa taṁ, bhikkhave, kāyasaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharonti, yaṁpaccayāssa taṁ uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ.
an4.171:2.3: Sampajāno vā taṁ, bhikkhave, kāyasaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharoti, yaṁpaccayāssa taṁ uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ.
an4.171:2.4: Asampajāno vā taṁ, bhikkhave, kāyasaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharoti, yaṁpaccayāssa taṁ uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ.
an4.171:3.1: Sāmaṁ vā taṁ, bhikkhave, vacīsaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharoti, yaṁpaccayāssa taṁ uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ;
an4.171:3.2: pare vāssa taṁ, bhikkhave, vacīsaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharonti;
an4.171:3.4: sampajāno vā taṁ, bhikkhave, vacīsaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharoti, yaṁpaccayāssa taṁ uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ;
an4.171:3.5: asampajāno vā taṁ, bhikkhave, vacīsaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharoti, yaṁpaccayāssa taṁ uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ.
an4.171:4.1: Sāmaṁ vā taṁ, bhikkhave, manosaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharoti, yaṁpaccayāssa taṁ uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ;
an4.171:4.2: pare vāssa taṁ, bhikkhave, manosaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharonti, yaṁpaccayāssa taṁ uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ;
an4.171:4.3: sampajāno vā taṁ, bhikkhave, manosaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharoti, yaṁpaccayāssa taṁ uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ;
an4.171:4.4: asampajāno vā taṁ, bhikkhave, manosaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharoti, yaṁpaccayāssa taṁ uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ.
an4.171:5.2_0: avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā so kāyo na hoti yaṁpaccayāssa taṁ uppajjati ajjhattaṁ
an4.171:5.2_1: sukhadukkhaṁ, sā vācā na hoti yaṁpaccayāssa taṁ uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ,
an4.171:5.2_2: so mano na hoti yaṁpaccayāssa taṁ uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ,
an4.171:5.3: khettaṁ taṁ na hoti …pe… vatthu taṁ na hoti …pe… āyatanaṁ taṁ na hoti …pe… adhikaraṇaṁ taṁ na hoti yaṁpaccayāssa taṁ uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhanti.
an4.171:6.3: Atthi, bhikkhave, attabhāvapaṭilābho, yasmiṁ attabhāvapaṭilābhe attasañcetanā kamati, no parasañcetanā.
an4.171:6.4: Atthi, bhikkhave, attabhāvapaṭilābho, yasmiṁ attabhāvapaṭilābhe parasañcetanā kamati, no attasañcetanā.
an4.171:6.5: Atthi, bhikkhave, attabhāvapaṭilābho, yasmiṁ attabhāvapaṭilābhe attasañcetanā ca kamati parasañcetanā ca.
an4.171:6.6: Atthi, bhikkhave, attabhāvapaṭilābho, yasmiṁ attabhāvapaṭilābhe nevattasañcetanā kamati, no parasañcetanā.
an4.171:7.1: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an4.171:7.2: “imassa kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmi:
an4.171:7.3: ‘tatra, bhante, yāyaṁ attabhāvapaṭilābho yasmiṁ attabhāvapaṭilābhe attasañcetanā kamati no parasañcetanā, attasañcetanāhetu tesaṁ sattānaṁ tamhā kāyā cuti hoti.
an4.171:7.4: Tatra, bhante, yāyaṁ attabhāvapaṭilābho yasmiṁ attabhāvapaṭilābhe parasañcetanā kamati no attasañcetanā, parasañcetanāhetu tesaṁ sattānaṁ tamhā kāyā cuti hoti.
an4.171:7.5_0: Tatra, bhante, yāyaṁ attabhāvapaṭilābho yasmiṁ attabhāvapaṭilābhe attasañcetanā ca
an4.171:7.5_1: kamati parasañcetanā ca, attasañcetanā ca parasañcetanā ca hetu tesaṁ sattānaṁ tamhā kāyā cuti hoti.
an4.171:7.6: Tatra, bhante, yāyaṁ attabhāvapaṭilābho yasmiṁ attabhāvapaṭilābhe neva attasañcetanā kamati no parasañcetanā, katame tena devā daṭṭhabbā’”ti?
an4.171:8.1: “Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena m’idhekacce sattā tamhā kāyā cutā āgāmino honti āgantāro itthattaṁ?
an4.171:8.2: Ko pana, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena m’idhekacce sattā tamhā kāyā cutā anāgāmino honti anāgantāro itthattan”ti?
an4.171:8.3: “Idha, sāriputta, ekaccassa puggalassa orambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni appahīnāni honti, so diṭṭheva dhamme nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.171:8.4: So tadassādeti, taṁ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati;
an4.171:8.5: tattha ṭhito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihārī aparihīno kālaṁ kurumāno nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpagānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an4.171:8.6: So tato cuto āgāmī hoti āgantā itthattaṁ.
an4.171:9.1: Idha pana, sāriputta, ekaccassa puggalassa orambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni pahīnāni honti, so diṭṭheva dhamme nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.171:9.2: So tadassādeti, taṁ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati;
an4.171:9.3: tattha ṭhito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihārī aparihīno kālaṁ kurumāno nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpagānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an4.171:9.4: So tato cuto anāgāmī hoti anāgantā itthattaṁ.
an4.171:10.1: Ayaṁ kho, sāriputta, hetu ayaṁ paccayo, yena m’idhekacce sattā tamhā kāyā cutā āgāmino honti āgantāro itthattaṁ.
an4.171:10.2: Ayaṁ pana, sāriputta, hetu ayaṁ paccayo, yena m’idhekacce sattā tamhā kāyā cutā anāgāmino honti anāgantāro itthattan”ti.
an4.172:1.1: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an4.172:1.3: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
an4.172:2.1: “Addhamāsūpasampannena me, āvuso, atthapaṭisambhidā sacchikatā odhiso byañjanaso.
an4.172:2.2: Tamahaṁ anekapariyāyena ācikkhāmi desemi paññāpemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi.
an4.172:2.3: Yassa kho panassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā, so maṁ pañhena.
an4.172:2.4: Ahaṁ veyyākaraṇena sammukhībhūto no satthā yo no dhammānaṁ sukusalo.
an4.172:3.1: Addhamāsūpasampannena me, āvuso, dhammapaṭisambhidā sacchikatā odhiso byañjanaso.
an4.172:3.2: Tamahaṁ anekapariyāyena ācikkhāmi desemi paññāpemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi.
an4.172:3.3: Yassa kho panassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā, so maṁ pañhena.
an4.172:3.4: Ahaṁ veyyākaraṇena sammukhībhūto no satthā yo no dhammānaṁ sukusalo.
an4.172:4.1: Addhamāsūpasampannena me, āvuso, niruttipaṭisambhidā sacchikatā odhiso byañjanaso.
an4.172:4.2: Tamahaṁ anekapariyāyena ācikkhāmi desemi paññāpemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi.
an4.172:4.3: Yassa kho panassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā, so maṁ pañhena.
an4.172:4.4: Ahaṁ veyyākaraṇena sammukhībhūto no satthā yo no dhammānaṁ sukusalo.
an4.172:5.1: Addhamāsūpasampannena me, āvuso, paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā sacchikatā odhiso byañjanaso.
an4.172:5.2: Tamahaṁ anekapariyāyena ācikkhāmi desemi paññāpemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi.
an4.172:5.3: Yassa kho panassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā, so maṁ pañhena.
an4.172:5.4: Ahaṁ veyyākaraṇena sammukhībhūto no satthā yo no dhammānaṁ sukusalo”ti.
an4.173:1.1: Atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā sāriputtena saddhiṁ sammodi.
an4.173:1.2: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
an4.173:6.1: “Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā atthi ca natthi ca aññaṁ kiñcī”ti?
an4.173:8.1: “Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā nevatthi no natthaññaṁ kiñcī”ti?
an4.173:10.1: “‘Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā atthaññaṁ kiñcī’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno ‘mā hevaṁ, āvuso’ti vadesi.
an4.173:10.2: ‘Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā natthaññaṁ kiñcī’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
an4.173:10.4: ‘Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā atthi ca natthi ca aññaṁ kiñcī’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
an4.173:10.6: ‘Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā nevatthi no natthaññaṁ kiñcī’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
an4.173:10.8: Yathā kathaṁ pana, āvuso, imassa bhāsitassa attho daṭṭhabbo”ti?
an4.173:11.1: “‘Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā atthaññaṁ kiñcī’ti, iti vadaṁ appapañcaṁ papañceti.
an4.173:11.2: ‘Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā natthaññaṁ kiñcī’ti, iti vadaṁ appapañcaṁ papañceti.
an4.173:11.3: ‘Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā atthi ca natthi ca aññaṁ kiñcī’ti, iti vadaṁ appapañcaṁ papañceti.
an4.173:11.4: ‘Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā nevatthi no natthaññaṁ kiñcī’ti, iti vadaṁ appapañcaṁ papañceti.
an4.173:11.5: Yāvatā, āvuso, channaṁ phassāyatanānaṁ gati tāvatā papañcassa gati;
an4.173:11.6: yāvatā papañcassa gati tāvatā channaṁ phassāyatanānaṁ gati.
an4.173:11.7: Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā papañcanirodho papañcavūpasamo”ti.
an4.174:1.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yenāyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā mahākoṭṭhikena saddhiṁ sammodi.
an4.174:1.2: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando āyasmantaṁ mahākoṭṭhikaṁ etadavoca:
an4.174:6.1: “Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā atthi ca natthi ca aññaṁ kiñcī”ti?
an4.174:8.1: “Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā nevatthi no natthaññaṁ kiñcī”ti?
an4.174:10.1: “‘Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā atthaññaṁ kiñcī’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
an4.174:10.3: ‘Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā natthaññaṁ kiñcī’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
an4.174:10.5: ‘Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā atthi ca natthi ca aññaṁ kiñcī’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
an4.174:10.7: ‘Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā nevatthi no natthaññaṁ kiñcī’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
an4.174:10.9: Yathā kathaṁ panāvuso, imassa bhāsitassa attho daṭṭhabbo”ti?
an4.174:11.1: “‘Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā atthaññaṁ kiñcī’ti, iti vadaṁ appapañcaṁ papañceti.
an4.174:11.2: ‘Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā natthaññaṁ kiñcī’ti, iti vadaṁ appapañcaṁ papañceti.
an4.174:11.3: ‘Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā atthi ca natthi ca aññaṁ kiñcī’ti, iti vadaṁ appapañcaṁ papañceti.
an4.174:11.4: ‘Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā nevatthi no natthaññaṁ kiñcī’ti, iti vadaṁ appapañcaṁ papañceti.
an4.174:11.5: Yāvatā, āvuso, channaṁ phassāyatanānaṁ gati tāvatā papañcassa gati.
an4.174:11.6: Yāvatā papañcassa gati tāvatā channaṁ phassāyatanānaṁ gati.
an4.174:11.7: Channaṁ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā papañcanirodho papañcavūpasamo”ti.
an4.175:1.1: Atha kho āyasmā upavāṇo yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā sāriputtena saddhiṁ sammodi.
an4.175:1.2: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā upavāṇo āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
an4.175:2.1: “Kiṁ nu kho, āvuso sāriputta, vijjāyantakaro hotī”ti?
an4.175:10.1: “‘Kiṁ nu kho, āvuso sāriputta, vijjāyantakaro hotī’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
an4.175:10.3: ‘Kiṁ panāvuso sāriputta, caraṇenantakaro hotī’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
an4.175:10.5: ‘Kiṁ panāvuso sāriputta, vijjācaraṇenantakaro hotī’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
an4.175:10.7: ‘Kiṁ panāvuso sāriputta, aññatra vijjācaraṇenantakaro hotī’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
an4.175:11.1: “Vijjāya ce, āvuso, antakaro abhavissa, saupādānova samāno antakaro abhavissa.
an4.175:11.2: Caraṇena ce, āvuso, antakaro abhavissa, saupādānova samāno antakaro abhavissa.
an4.175:11.3: Vijjācaraṇena ce, āvuso, antakaro abhavissa, saupādānova samāno antakaro abhavissa.
an4.175:11.4: Aññatra vijjācaraṇena ce, āvuso, antakaro abhavissa, puthujjano antakaro abhavissa.
an4.175:11.6: Caraṇavipanno kho, āvuso, yathābhūtaṁ na jānāti na passati.
an4.176:1.1: “Saddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ sammā āyācamāno āyāceyya:
an4.176:1.3: Esā, bhikkhave, tulā etaṁ pamāṇaṁ mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, yadidaṁ sāriputtamoggallānā.
an4.176:2.1: Saddhā, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī evaṁ sammā āyācamānā āyāceyya:
an4.176:2.2: ‘tādisā homi yādisā khemā ca bhikkhunī uppalavaṇṇā cā’ti.
an4.176:2.3: Esā, bhikkhave, tulā etaṁ pamāṇaṁ mama sāvikānaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ, yadidaṁ khemā ca bhikkhunī uppalavaṇṇā ca.
an4.176:3.1: Saddho, bhikkhave, upāsako evaṁ sammā āyācamāno āyāceyya:
an4.176:3.2: ‘tādiso homi yādiso citto ca gahapati hatthako ca āḷavako’ti.
an4.176:3.3: Esā, bhikkhave, tulā etaṁ pamāṇaṁ mama sāvakānaṁ upāsakānaṁ, yadidaṁ citto ca gahapati hatthako ca āḷavako.
an4.176:4.1: Saddhā, bhikkhave, upāsikā evaṁ sammā āyācamānā āyāceyya:
an4.176:4.2: ‘tādisā homi yādisā khujjuttarā ca upāsikā veḷukaṇḍakiyā ca nandamātā’ti.
an4.176:4.3: Esā, bhikkhave, tulā etaṁ pamāṇaṁ mama sāvikānaṁ upāsikānaṁ, yadidaṁ khujjuttarā ca upāsikā veḷukaṇḍakiyā ca nandamātā”ti.
an4.177:1.1: Atha kho āyasmā rāhulo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ rāhulaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an4.177:2.1: “Yā ca, rāhula, ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu yā ca bāhirā pathavīdhātu, pathavīdhāturevesā.
an4.177:2.2: ‘Taṁ netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti, evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
an4.177:2.3: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā pathavīdhātuyā nibbindati, pathavīdhātuyā cittaṁ virājeti.
an4.177:3.1: Yā ca, rāhula, ajjhattikā āpodhātu yā ca bāhirā āpodhātu, āpodhāturevesā.
an4.177:3.2: ‘Taṁ netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti, evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
an4.177:3.3: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā āpodhātuyā nibbindati, āpodhātuyā cittaṁ virājeti.
an4.177:4.1: Yā ca, rāhula, ajjhattikā tejodhātu yā ca bāhirā tejodhātu, tejodhāturevesā.
an4.177:4.2: ‘Taṁ netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti, evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
an4.177:4.3: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā tejodhātuyā nibbindati, tejodhātuyā cittaṁ virājeti.
an4.177:5.1: Yā ca, rāhula, ajjhattikā vāyodhātu yā ca bāhirā vāyodhātu, vāyodhāturevesā.
an4.177:5.2: ‘Taṁ netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti, evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
an4.177:5.3: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā vāyodhātuyā nibbindati, vāyodhātuyā cittaṁ virājeti.
an4.177:6.1_0: Yato kho, rāhula, bhikkhu imāsu catūsu dhātūsu nevattānaṁ na attaniyaṁ samanupassati,
an4.177:6.1_1: ayaṁ vuccati, rāhula, bhikkhu acchecchi taṇhaṁ, vivattayi saṁyojanaṁ, sammā mānābhisamayā
an4.178:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ santaṁ cetovimuttiṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.178:1.5: Tassa sakkāyanirodhaṁ manasi karoto sakkāyanirodhe cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati nādhimuccati.
an4.178:1.6: Tassa kho evaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na sakkāyanirodho pāṭikaṅkho.
an4.178:1.7: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso lepagatena hatthena sākhaṁ gaṇheyya, tassa so hattho sajjeyyapi gaṇheyyapi bajjheyyapi;
an4.178:1.8: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ santaṁ cetovimuttiṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.178:1.10: Tassa sakkāyanirodhaṁ manasi karoto sakkāyanirodhe cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati nādhimuccati.
an4.178:1.11: Tassa kho evaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na sakkāyanirodho pāṭikaṅkho.
an4.178:2.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ santaṁ cetovimuttiṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.178:2.3: Tassa sakkāyanirodhaṁ manasi karoto sakkāyanirodhe cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati.
an4.178:2.4: Tassa kho evaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sakkāyanirodho pāṭikaṅkho.
an4.178:2.5: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso suddhena hatthena sākhaṁ gaṇheyya, tassa so hattho neva sajjeyya na gaṇheyya na bajjheyya;
an4.178:2.6: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ santaṁ cetovimuttiṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.178:2.8: Tassa sakkāyanirodhaṁ manasi karoto sakkāyanirodhe cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati.
an4.178:2.9: Tassa kho evaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sakkāyanirodho pāṭikaṅkho.
an4.178:3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ santaṁ cetovimuttiṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.178:3.3: Tassa avijjāppabhedaṁ manasi karoto avijjāppabhede cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati nādhimuccati.
an4.178:3.4: Tassa kho evaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na avijjāppabhedo pāṭikaṅkho.
an4.178:3.6: Tassā puriso yāni ceva āyamukhāni tāni pidaheyya, yāni ca apāyamukhāni tāni vivareyya, devo ca na sammā dhāraṁ anuppaveccheyya.
an4.178:3.7: Evañhi tassā, bhikkhave, jambāliyā na āḷippabhedo pāṭikaṅkho.
an4.178:3.8: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ santaṁ cetovimuttiṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.178:3.10: Tassa avijjāppabhedaṁ manasi karoto avijjāppabhede cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati nādhimuccati.
an4.178:3.11: Tassa kho evaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na avijjāppabhedo pāṭikaṅkho.
an4.178:4.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ santaṁ cetovimuttiṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.178:4.3: Tassa avijjāppabhedaṁ manasi karoto avijjāppabhede cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati.
an4.178:4.4: Tassa kho evaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno avijjāppabhedo pāṭikaṅkho.
an4.178:4.6: Tassā puriso yāni ceva āyamukhāni tāni vivareyya, yāni ca apāyamukhāni tāni pidaheyya, devo ca sammā dhāraṁ anuppaveccheyya.
an4.178:4.7: Evañhi tassā, bhikkhave, jambāliyā āḷippabhedo pāṭikaṅkho.
an4.178:4.8: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ santaṁ cetovimuttiṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.178:4.10: Tassa avijjāppabhedaṁ manasi karoto avijjāppabhede cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati.
an4.178:4.11: Tassa kho evaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno avijjāppabhedo pāṭikaṅkho.
an4.178:4.12: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4.179:1.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā sāriputtena saddhiṁ sammodi.
an4.179:1.2: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
an4.179:1.3: “ko nu kho, āvuso sāriputta, hetu ko paccayo, yena m’idhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme na parinibbāyantī”ti?
an4.179:2.1_0: “Idhāvuso ānanda, sattā imā hānabhāgiyā saññāti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti, imā ṭhitibhāgiyā
an4.179:2.1_1: saññāti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti, imā visesabhāgiyā saññāti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti,
an4.179:2.2: Ayaṁ kho, āvuso ānanda, hetu ayaṁ paccayo, yena m’idhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme na parinibbāyantī”ti.
an4.179:3.1: “Ko panāvuso sāriputta, hetu ko paccayo, yena m’idhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyantī”ti?
an4.179:3.2_0: “Idhāvuso ānanda, sattā imā hānabhāgiyā saññāti yathābhūtaṁ pajānanti, imā ṭhitibhāgiyā
an4.179:3.2_1: saññāti yathābhūtaṁ pajānanti, imā visesabhāgiyā saññāti yathābhūtaṁ pajānanti, imā
an4.179:3.3: Ayaṁ kho, āvuso ānanda, hetu ayaṁ paccayo, yena m’idhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyantī”ti.
an4.180:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā bhoganagare viharati ānandacetiye.
an4.180:1.7: taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an4.180:1.8: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
an4.180:2.3: ‘sammukhā metaṁ, āvuso, bhagavato sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ—
an4.180:2.4: ayaṁ dhammo, ayaṁ vinayo, idaṁ satthusāsanan’ti.
an4.180:2.5: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhāsitaṁ neva abhinanditabbaṁ nappaṭikkositabbaṁ.
an4.180:2.6: Anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā tāni padabyañjanāni sādhukaṁ uggahetvā sutte otāretabbāni, vinaye sandassetabbāni.
an4.180:2.7: Tāni ce sutte otāriyamānāni vinaye sandassiyamānāni na ceva sutte otaranti na vinaye sandissanti, niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ:
an4.180:2.8: ‘addhā idaṁ na ceva tassa bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa;
an4.180:3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ vadeyya:
an4.180:3.2: ‘sammukhā metaṁ, āvuso, bhagavato sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ—
an4.180:3.3: ayaṁ dhammo, ayaṁ vinayo, idaṁ satthusāsanan’ti.
an4.180:3.4: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhāsitaṁ neva abhinanditabbaṁ nappaṭikkositabbaṁ.
an4.180:3.5: Anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā tāni padabyañjanāni sādhukaṁ uggahetvā sutte otāretabbāni, vinaye sandassetabbāni.
an4.180:3.6: Tāni ce sutte otāriyamānāni vinaye sandassiyamānāni sutte ceva otaranti vinaye ca sandissanti, niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ:
an4.180:3.7: ‘addhā idaṁ tassa bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa;
an4.180:4.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ vadeyya:
an4.180:4.2: ‘asukasmiṁ nāma āvāse saṅgho viharati sathero sapāmokkho.
an4.180:4.3: Tassa me saṅghassa sammukhā sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ—
an4.180:4.4: ayaṁ dhammo, ayaṁ vinayo, idaṁ satthusāsanan’ti.
an4.180:4.5: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhāsitaṁ neva abhinanditabbaṁ nappaṭikkositabbaṁ.
an4.180:4.6: Anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā tāni padabyañjanāni sādhukaṁ uggahetvā sutte otāretabbāni, vinaye sandassetabbāni.
an4.180:4.7: Tāni ce sutte otāriyamānāni vinaye sandassiyamānāni na ceva sutte otaranti na vinaye sandissanti, niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ:
an4.180:4.8: ‘addhā idaṁ na ceva tassa bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa;
an4.180:5.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ vadeyya:
an4.180:5.2: ‘asukasmiṁ nāma āvāse saṅgho viharati sathero sapāmokkho.
an4.180:5.3: Tassa me saṅghassa sammukhā sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ—
an4.180:5.4: ayaṁ dhammo, ayaṁ vinayo, idaṁ satthusāsanan’ti.
an4.180:5.5: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhāsitaṁ neva abhinanditabbaṁ nappaṭikkositabbaṁ.
an4.180:5.6: Anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā tāni padabyañjanāni sādhukaṁ uggahetvā sutte otāretabbāni, vinaye sandassetabbāni.
an4.180:5.7: Tāni ce sutte otāriyamānāni, vinaye sandassiyamānāni sutte ceva otaranti vinaye ca sandissanti, niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ:
an4.180:5.8: ‘addhā idaṁ tassa bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa;
an4.180:6.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ vadeyya:
an4.180:6.2: ‘asukasmiṁ nāma āvāse sambahulā therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā.
an4.180:6.3: Tesaṁ me therānaṁ sammukhā sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ—
an4.180:6.4: ayaṁ dhammo, ayaṁ vinayo, idaṁ satthusāsanan’ti.
an4.180:6.5: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhāsitaṁ neva abhinanditabbaṁ nappaṭikkositabbaṁ.
an4.180:6.6: Anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā tāni padabyañjanāni sādhukaṁ uggahetvā sutte otāretabbāni, vinaye sandassetabbāni.
an4.180:6.7: Tāni ce sutte otāriyamānāni vinaye sandassiyamānāni na ceva sutte otaranti na vinaye sandissanti, niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ:
an4.180:6.8: ‘addhā idaṁ na ceva tassa bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa;

an4.180:7.3: Tesaṁ me therānaṁ sammukhā sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ—

an4.180:7.5: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhāsitaṁ neva abhinanditabbaṁ nappaṭikkositabbaṁ.
an4.180:7.6: Anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā tāni padabyañjanāni sādhukaṁ uggahetvā sutte otāretabbāni, vinaye sandassetabbāni.
an4.180:7.7: Tāni ce sutte otāriyamānāni vinaye sandassiyamānāni sutte ceva otaranti vinaye ca sandissanti, niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ:
an4.180:7.8: ‘addhā idaṁ tassa bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa;

an4.180:8.2: ‘asukasmiṁ nāma āvāse eko thero bhikkhu viharati bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo.
an4.180:8.3: Tassa me therassa sammukhā sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ—

an4.180:9.3: Tassa me therassa sammukhā sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ—

an4.180:9.6: Anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā tāni padabyañjanāni sādhukaṁ uggahetvā sutte otāretabbāni, vinaye sandassetabbāni.
an4.180:9.7: Tāni ce sutte otāriyamānāni vinaye sandassiyamānāni sutte ceva otaranti vinaye ca sandissanti, niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ:

an4.181:1.1: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato yodhājīvo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo, rañño aṅganteva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
an4.181:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, yodhājīvo ṭhānakusalo ca hoti, dūrepātī ca, akkhaṇavedhī ca, mahato ca kāyassa padāletā.
an4.181:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi aṅgehi samannāgato yodhājīvo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo, rañño aṅganteva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
an4.181:1.5: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
an4.181:1.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ṭhānakusalo ca hoti, dūrepātī ca, akkhaṇavedhī ca, mahato ca kāyassa padāletā.
an4.181:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti …pe… samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
an4.181:2.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ṭhānakusalo hoti.
an4.181:3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā
an4.181:3.2_1: vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā, sabbaṁ rūpaṁ
an4.181:3.2_2: ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
an4.181:3.6_0: yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ
an4.181:3.6_1: vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā, sabbaṁ viññāṇaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi,
an4.181:3.6_2: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
an4.181:3.7: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dūrepātī hoti.
an4.181:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
an4.181:4.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhaṇavedhī hoti.
an4.181:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mahato kāyassa padāletā hoti?
an4.181:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mahantaṁ avijjākkhandhaṁ padāletā.
an4.181:5.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mahato kāyassa padāletā hoti.
an4.181:5.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā”ti.
an4.182:1.2: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṁ.
an4.182:2.3: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṁ;
an4.182:2.5: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṁ;
an4.182:2.7: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṁ;
an4.182:2.8_0: ‘yāni kho pana tāni pubbe attanā katāni pāpakāni kammāni saṅkilesikāni ponobhavikāni
an4.182:2.8_1: sadarāni dukkhavipākāni āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇikāni, tesaṁ vipāko mā nibbattī’ti natthi koci pāṭibhogo—
an4.182:2.9: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṁ.
an4.182:3.1: Imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, catunnaṁ dhammānaṁ natthi koci pāṭibhogo—
an4.182:3.2: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmin”ti.
an4.183:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
an4.183:1.2: Atha kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
an4.183:1.3: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an4.183:2.3: evaṁ me diṭṭhanti, natthi tato doso;
an4.183:2.5: evaṁ me sutanti, natthi tato doso;
an4.183:2.7: evaṁ me mutanti, natthi tato doso;
an4.183:2.9: evaṁ me viññātanti, natthi tato doso’”ti.
an4.183:3.2: na panāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, sabbaṁ diṭṭhaṁ na bhāsitabbanti vadāmi;
an4.183:3.3: nāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, sabbaṁ sutaṁ bhāsitabbanti vadāmi;
an4.183:3.4: na panāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, sabbaṁ sutaṁ na bhāsitabbanti vadāmi;
an4.183:3.5: nāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, sabbaṁ mutaṁ bhāsitabbanti vadāmi;
an4.183:3.6: na panāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, sabbaṁ mutaṁ na bhāsitabbanti vadāmi;
an4.183:3.7: nāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, sabbaṁ viññātaṁ bhāsitabbanti vadāmi;
an4.183:3.8: na panāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, sabbaṁ viññātaṁ na bhāsitabbanti vadāmi.
an4.183:4.1: Yañhi, brāhmaṇa, diṭṭhaṁ bhāsato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, evarūpaṁ diṭṭhaṁ na bhāsitabbanti vadāmi.
an4.183:4.2: Yañca khvassa, brāhmaṇa, diṭṭhaṁ abhāsato kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, evarūpaṁ diṭṭhaṁ bhāsitabbanti vadāmi.
an4.183:5.1: Yañhi, brāhmaṇa, sutaṁ bhāsato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, evarūpaṁ sutaṁ na bhāsitabbanti vadāmi.
an4.183:5.2: Yañca khvassa, brāhmaṇa, sutaṁ abhāsato kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, evarūpaṁ sutaṁ bhāsitabbanti vadāmi.
an4.183:6.1: Yañhi, brāhmaṇa, mutaṁ bhāsato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, evarūpaṁ mutaṁ na bhāsitabbanti vadāmi.
an4.183:6.2: Yañca khvassa, brāhmaṇa, mutaṁ abhāsato kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, evarūpaṁ mutaṁ bhāsitabbanti vadāmi.
an4.183:7.1: Yañhi, brāhmaṇa, viññātaṁ bhāsato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, evarūpaṁ viññātaṁ na bhāsitabbanti vadāmi.
an4.183:7.2: Yañca khvassa, brāhmaṇa, viññātaṁ abhāsato kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, evarūpaṁ viññātaṁ bhāsitabbanti vadāmī”ti.
an4.183:8.1: Atha kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmīti.
an4.184:1.1: Atha kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
an4.184:1.2: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an4.184:2.2: ‘natthi yo maraṇadhammo samāno na bhāyati, na santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassā’”ti.
an4.184:2.3: “Atthi, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno bhāyati, santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassa;
an4.184:2.4: atthi pana, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno na bhāyati, na santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassa.
an4.184:3.1: Katamo ca, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno bhāyati, santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassa?
an4.184:3.2: Idha, brāhmaṇa, ekacco kāmesu avītarāgo hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipāso avigatapariḷāho avigatataṇho.
an4.184:3.4: Tassa aññatarena gāḷhena rogātaṅkena phuṭṭhassa evaṁ hoti:
an4.184:3.5: ‘piyā vata maṁ kāmā jahissanti, piye cāhaṁ kāme jahissāmī’ti.
an4.184:3.6: So socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṁ kandati, sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an4.184:3.7: Ayaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno bhāyati, santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassa.
an4.184:4.1: Puna caparaṁ, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco kāye avītarāgo hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipāso avigatapariḷāho avigatataṇho.
an4.184:4.3: Tassa aññatarena gāḷhena rogātaṅkena phuṭṭhassa evaṁ hoti:
an4.184:4.4: ‘piyo vata maṁ kāyo jahissati, piyañcāhaṁ kāyaṁ jahissāmī’ti.
an4.184:4.5: So socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṁ kandati, sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an4.184:4.6: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno bhāyati, santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassa.
an4.184:5.1: Puna caparaṁ, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco akatakalyāṇo hoti akatakusalo akatabhīruttāṇo katapāpo kataluddo katakibbiso.
an4.184:5.3: Tassa aññatarena gāḷhena rogātaṅkena phuṭṭhassa evaṁ hoti:
an4.184:5.4: ‘akataṁ vata me kalyāṇaṁ, akataṁ kusalaṁ, akataṁ bhīruttāṇaṁ;
an4.184:5.5: kataṁ pāpaṁ, kataṁ luddaṁ, kataṁ kibbisaṁ.
an4.184:5.6: Yāvatā, bho, akatakalyāṇānaṁ akatakusalānaṁ akatabhīruttāṇānaṁ katapāpānaṁ kataluddānaṁ katakibbisānaṁ gati taṁ gatiṁ pecca gacchāmī’ti.
an4.184:5.7: So socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṁ kandati, sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an4.184:5.8: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno bhāyati, santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassa.
an4.184:6.1: Puna caparaṁ, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco kaṅkhī hoti vicikicchī aniṭṭhaṅgato saddhamme.
an4.184:6.3: Tassa aññatarena gāḷhena rogātaṅkena phuṭṭhassa evaṁ hoti:
an4.184:6.5: So socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṁ kandati, sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an4.184:6.6: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno bhāyati, santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassa.
an4.184:6.7: Ime kho, brāhmaṇa, cattāro maraṇadhammā samānā bhāyanti, santāsaṁ āpajjanti maraṇassa.
an4.184:7.1: Katamo ca, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno na bhāyati, na santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassa?
an4.184:7.2: Idha, brāhmaṇa, ekacco kāmesu vītarāgo hoti vigatacchando vigatapemo vigatapipāso vigatapariḷāho vigatataṇho.
an4.184:7.4: Tassa aññatarena gāḷhena rogātaṅkena phuṭṭhassa na evaṁ hoti:
an4.184:7.5: ‘piyā vata maṁ kāmā jahissanti, piye cāhaṁ kāme jahissāmī’ti.
an4.184:7.6: So na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattāḷiṁ kandati, na sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an4.184:7.7: Ayaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno na bhāyati, na santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassa.
an4.184:8.1: Puna caparaṁ, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco kāye vītarāgo hoti vigatacchando vigatapemo vigatapipāso vigatapariḷāho vigatataṇho.
an4.184:8.3: Tassa aññatarena gāḷhena rogātaṅkena phuṭṭhassa na evaṁ hoti:
an4.184:8.4: ‘piyo vata maṁ kāyo jahissati, piyañcāhaṁ kāyaṁ jahissāmī’ti.
an4.184:8.5: So na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattāḷiṁ kandati, na sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an4.184:8.6: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno na bhāyati, na santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassa.
an4.184:9.1: Puna caparaṁ, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco akatapāpo hoti akataluddo akatakibbiso katakalyāṇo katakusalo katabhīruttāṇo.
an4.184:9.3: Tassa aññatarena gāḷhena rogātaṅkena phuṭṭhassa evaṁ hoti:
an4.184:9.4: ‘akataṁ vata me pāpaṁ, akataṁ luddaṁ, akataṁ kibbisaṁ;
an4.184:9.5: kataṁ kalyāṇaṁ, kataṁ kusalaṁ, kataṁ bhīruttāṇaṁ.
an4.184:9.6: Yāvatā, bho, akatapāpānaṁ akataluddānaṁ akatakibbisānaṁ katakalyāṇānaṁ katakusalānaṁ katabhīruttāṇānaṁ gati taṁ gatiṁ pecca gacchāmī’ti.
an4.184:9.7: So na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattāḷiṁ kandati, na sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an4.184:9.8: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno na bhāyati, na santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassa.
an4.184:10.1: Puna caparaṁ, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco akaṅkhī hoti avicikicchī niṭṭhaṅgato saddhamme.
an4.184:10.3: Tassa aññatarena gāḷhena rogātaṅkena phuṭṭhassa evaṁ hoti:
an4.184:10.5: So na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattāḷiṁ kandati, na sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an4.184:10.6: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno na bhāyati, na santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassa.
an4.184:10.7: Ime kho, brāhmaṇa, cattāro maraṇadhammā samānā na bhāyanti, na santāsaṁ āpajjanti maraṇassā”ti.
an4.184:11.1: “Abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama …pe… upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
an4.185:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
an4.185:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā abhiññātā abhiññātā paribbājakā sippinikātīre paribbājakārāme
an4.185:1.2_1: paṭivasanti, seyyathidaṁ annabhāro varadharo sakuludāyī ca paribbājako aññe ca abhiññātā
an4.185:1.3: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena sippinikātīre paribbājakārāmo tenupasaṅkami.
an4.185:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena tesaṁ aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ sannisinnānaṁ sannipatitānaṁ ayamantarā kathā udapādi:
an4.185:2.3: Atha kho bhagavā yena te paribbājakā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi. Nisajja kho bhagavā te paribbājake etadavoca:
an4.185:3.1: “Kāya nuttha, paribbājakā, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā, kā ca pana vo antarākathā vippakatā”ti?
an4.185:3.2: “Idha, bho gotama, amhākaṁ sannisinnānaṁ sannipatitānaṁ ayamantarākathā udapādi:
an4.185:4.1: “Cattārimāni, paribbājakā, brāhmaṇasaccāni mayā sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā paveditāni.
an4.185:4.5: Iti vadaṁ brāhmaṇo saccaṁ āha, no musā.
an4.185:4.6: So tena na samaṇoti maññati, na brāhmaṇoti maññati, na seyyohamasmīti maññati, na sadisohamasmīti maññati, na hīnohamasmīti maññati.
an4.185:4.7: Api ca yadeva tattha saccaṁ tadabhiññāya pāṇānaṁyeva anuddayāya anukampāya paṭipanno hoti.
an4.185:5.3: Iti vadaṁ brāhmaṇo saccamāha, no musā.
an4.185:5.4: So tena na samaṇoti maññati, na brāhmaṇoti maññati, na seyyohamasmīti maññati, na sadisohamasmīti maññati, na hīnohamasmīti maññati.
an4.185:5.5: Api ca yadeva tattha saccaṁ tadabhiññāya kāmānaṁyeva nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
an4.185:6.2: ‘sabbe bhavā aniccā …pe… tadabhiññāya bhavānaṁyeva nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
an4.185:7.2: ‘nāhaṁ kvacani kassaci kiñcanatasmiṁ na ca mama kvacani katthaci kiñcanatatthī’ti.
an4.185:7.3: Iti vadaṁ brāhmaṇo saccaṁ āha, no musā.
an4.185:7.4: So tena na samaṇoti maññati, na brāhmaṇoti maññati, na seyyohamasmīti maññati, na sadisohamasmīti maññati, na hīnohamasmīti maññati.
an4.185:7.5: Api ca yadeva tattha saccaṁ tadabhiññāya ākiñcaññaṁyeva paṭipadaṁ paṭipanno hoti.
an4.185:7.6: Imāni kho, paribbājakā, cattāri brāhmaṇasaccāni mayā sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā paveditānī”ti.
an4.186:1.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an4.186:1.2: “kena nu kho, bhante, loko nīyati, kena loko parikassati, kassa ca uppannassa vasaṁ gacchatī”ti?
an4.186:2.2: Bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu, ummaggo, bhaddakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ, kalyāṇī paripucchā.
an4.186:2.4: ‘kena nu kho, bhante, loko nīyati, kena loko parikassati, kassa ca uppannassa vasaṁ gacchatī’”ti?
an4.186:2.6: “Cittena kho, bhikkhu, loko nīyati, cittena parikassati, cittassa uppannassa vasaṁ gacchatī”ti.
an4.186:3.1: “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṁ uttari pañhaṁ apucchi:
an4.186:3.3: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bahussuto dhammadharo hotī”ti?
an4.186:4.2: Bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu ummaggo, bhaddakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ, kalyāṇī paripucchā.
an4.186:4.5: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bahussuto dhammadharo hotī’”ti?
an4.186:4.8: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthā, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
an4.186:4.9: Catuppadāya cepi, bhikkhu, gāthāya atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti bahussuto dhammadharoti alaṁvacanāyā”ti.
an4.186:5.1: “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṁ uttari pañhaṁ apucchi:
an4.186:5.3: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sutavā nibbedhikapañño hotī”ti?
an4.186:6.2: Bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu, ummaggo, bhaddakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ, kalyāṇī paripucchā.
an4.186:6.5: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sutavā nibbedhikapañño hotī’”ti?
an4.186:6.7: “Idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhuno ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti sutaṁ hoti, paññāya cassa atthaṁ ativijjha passati;
an4.186:6.8: ‘ayaṁ dukkhasamudayo’ti sutaṁ hoti, paññāya cassa atthaṁ ativijjha passati;
an4.186:6.9: ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodho’ti sutaṁ hoti, paññāya cassa atthaṁ ativijjha passati;
an4.186:6.10: ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti sutaṁ hoti, paññāya cassa atthaṁ ativijjha passati.
an4.186:6.11: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, sutavā nibbedhikapañño hotī”ti.
an4.186:7.1: “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṁ uttari pañhaṁ apucchi:
an4.186:7.3: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, paṇḍito mahāpañño hotī”ti?
an4.186:8.2: Bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu, ummaggo, bhaddakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ, kalyāṇī paripucchā.
an4.186:8.5: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, paṇḍito mahāpañño hotī’”ti?
an4.186:8.7: “Idha, bhikkhu, paṇḍito mahāpañño nevattabyābādhāya ceteti na parabyābādhāya ceteti na ubhayabyābādhāya ceteti attahitaparahitaubhayahitasabbalokahitameva cintayamāno cinteti.
an4.186:8.8: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, paṇḍito mahāpañño hotī”ti.
an4.187:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
an4.187:1.2: Atha kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
an4.187:1.3: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an4.187:2.1: “Jāneyya nu kho, bho gotama, asappuriso asappurisaṁ:
an4.187:2.3: “Aṭṭhānaṁ kho etaṁ, brāhmaṇa, anavakāso yaṁ asappuriso asappurisaṁ jāneyya:
an4.187:2.7: “Etampi kho, brāhmaṇa, aṭṭhānaṁ anavakāso yaṁ asappuriso sappurisaṁ jāneyya:
an4.187:2.9: “Jāneyya nu kho, bho gotama, sappuriso sappurisaṁ:
an4.187:2.11: “Ṭhānaṁ kho etaṁ, brāhmaṇa, vijjati yaṁ sappuriso sappurisaṁ jāneyya:
an4.187:2.15: “Etampi kho, brāhmaṇa, ṭhānaṁ vijjati yaṁ sappuriso asappurisaṁ jāneyya:
an4.187:3.3: ‘aṭṭhānaṁ kho etaṁ, brāhmaṇa, anavakāso yaṁ asappuriso asappurisaṁ jāneyya—
an4.187:3.5: Etampi kho, brāhmaṇa, aṭṭhānaṁ anavakāso yaṁ asappuriso sappurisaṁ jāneyya—
an4.187:3.7: Ṭhānaṁ kho etaṁ, brāhmaṇa, vijjati yaṁ sappuriso sappurisaṁ jāneyya—
an4.187:3.9: Etampi kho, brāhmaṇa, ṭhānaṁ vijjati yaṁ sappuriso asappurisaṁ jāneyya—
an4.187:4.1: Ekamidaṁ, bho gotama, samayaṁ todeyyassa brāhmaṇassa parisati parūpārambhaṁ vattenti:
an4.187:4.2: ‘bālo ayaṁ rājā eḷeyyo samaṇe rāmaputte abhippasanno, samaṇe ca pana rāmaputte evarūpaṁ paramanipaccakāraṁ karoti, yadidaṁ abhivādanaṁ paccuṭṭhānaṁ añjalikammaṁ sāmīcikammanti.
an4.187:4.4_0: yamako moggallo uggo nāvindakī gandhabbo aggivesso, ye samaṇe rāmaputte abhippasannā,
an4.187:4.4_1: samaṇe ca pana rāmaputte evarūpaṁ paramanipaccakāraṁ karonti, yadidaṁ abhivādanaṁ
an4.187:4.5: Tyāssudaṁ todeyyo brāhmaṇo iminā nayena neti.
an4.187:4.7: paṇḍito rājā eḷeyyo karaṇīyādhikaraṇīyesu vacanīyādhivacanīyesu alamatthadasatarehi alamatthadasataro’ti?
an4.187:4.8: ‘Evaṁ, bho, paṇḍito rājā eḷeyyo karaṇīyādhikaraṇīyesu vacanīyādhivacanīyesu alamatthadasatarehi alamatthadasataroti.
an4.187:5.1_0: Yasmā ca kho, bho, samaṇo rāmaputto raññā eḷeyyena paṇḍitena paṇḍitataro karaṇīyādhikaraṇīyesu
an4.187:5.1_1: vacanīyādhivacanīyesu alamatthadasatarena alamatthadasataro, tasmā rājā eḷeyyo samaṇe
an4.187:5.1_2: rāmaputte abhippasanno, samaṇe ca pana rāmaputte evarūpaṁ paramanipaccakāraṁ karoti,
an4.187:6.3: yamako moggallo uggo nāvindakī gandhabbo aggivesso, karaṇīyādhikaraṇīyesu vacanīyādhivacanīyesu alamatthadasatarehi alamatthadasatarā’ti?
an4.187:6.5: yamako moggallo uggo nāvindakī gandhabbo aggivesso, karaṇīyādhikaraṇīyesu vacanīyādhivacanīyesu alamatthadasatarehi alamatthadasatarāti.
an4.187:7.1_0: Yasmā ca kho, bho, samaṇo rāmaputto rañño eḷeyyassa parihārakehi paṇḍitehi paṇḍitataro
an4.187:7.1_2: tasmā rañño eḷeyyassa parihārakā samaṇe rāmaputte abhippasannā;
an4.187:7.2: samaṇe ca pana rāmaputte evarūpaṁ paramanipaccakāraṁ karonti, yadidaṁ abhivādanaṁ paccuṭṭhānaṁ añjalikammaṁ sāmīcikamman’ti.
an4.187:8.1: Acchariyaṁ, bho gotama, abbhutaṁ, bho gotama.
an4.187:8.3: ‘aṭṭhānaṁ kho etaṁ, brāhmaṇa, anavakāso yaṁ asappuriso asappurisaṁ jāneyya—
an4.187:8.5: Etampi kho, brāhmaṇa, aṭṭhānaṁ anavakāso yaṁ asappuriso sappurisaṁ jāneyya—
an4.187:8.7: Ṭhānaṁ kho etaṁ, brāhmaṇa, vijjati yaṁ sappuriso sappurisaṁ jāneyya—
an4.187:8.9: Etampi kho, brāhmaṇa, ṭhānaṁ vijjati yaṁ sappuriso asappurisaṁ jāneyya—
an4.187:8.11: Handa ca dāni mayaṁ, bho gotama, gacchāma.
an4.187:9.1: Atha kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmīti.
an4.188:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
an4.188:1.2: Atha kho upako maṇḍikāputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho upako maṇḍikāputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an4.188:2.2: ‘yo koci parūpārambhaṁ vatteti, parūpārambhaṁ vattento sabbo so na upapādeti.
an4.188:2.4: “Parūpārambhañce, upaka, vatteti parūpārambhaṁ vattento na upapādeti, anupapādento gārayho hoti upavajjo.
an4.188:2.5: Tvaṁ kho, upaka, parūpārambhaṁ vattesi, parūpārambhaṁ vattento na upapādesi, anupapādento gārayho hosi upavajjo”ti.
an4.188:2.7: evamevaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, ummujjamānakoyeva bhagavatā mahatā vādapāsena baddho”ti.
an4.188:3.2: Tattha aparimāṇā padā aparimāṇā byañjanā aparimāṇā tathāgatassa dhammadesanā—
an4.188:3.4: Taṁ kho panidaṁ akusalaṁ pahātabbanti kho, upaka, mayā paññattaṁ.
an4.188:3.5: Tattha aparimāṇā padā aparimāṇā byañjanā aparimāṇā tathāgatassa dhammadesanā—
an4.188:4.1: Idaṁ kusalanti kho, upaka, mayā paññattaṁ.
an4.188:4.2: Tattha aparimāṇā padā aparimāṇā byañjanā aparimāṇā tathāgatassa dhammadesanā—
an4.188:4.4: Taṁ kho panidaṁ kusalaṁ bhāvetabbanti kho, upaka, mayā paññattaṁ.
an4.188:4.5: Tattha aparimāṇā padā aparimāṇā byañjanā aparimāṇā tathāgatassa dhammadesanā—
an4.188:5.1_0: Atha kho upako maṇḍikāputto bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
an4.188:5.1_1: bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yena rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto
an4.188:5.1_2: tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā yāvatako ahosi bhagavatā saddhiṁ kathāsallāpo taṁ sabbaṁ
an4.188:5.2: Evaṁ vutte, rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto kupito anattamano upakaṁ maṇḍikāputtaṁ etadavoca:
an4.188:5.3: “yāva dhaṁsī vatāyaṁ loṇakāradārako yāva mukharo yāva pagabbo yatra hi nāma taṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ āsādetabbaṁ maññissati;
an4.188:5.4: apehi tvaṁ, upaka, vinassa, mā taṁ addasan”ti.
an4.189:1.7: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā kāyena sacchikaraṇīyā?
an4.189:2.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā satiyā sacchikaraṇīyā?
an4.189:3.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā cakkhunā sacchikaraṇīyā?
an4.189:4.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā paññāya sacchikaraṇīyā?
an4.189:4.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro sacchikaraṇīyā dhammā”ti.
an4.190:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde.
an4.190:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisinno hoti.
an4.190:1.3: Atha kho bhagavā tuṇhībhūtaṁ tuṇhībhūtaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ anuviloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
an4.190:2.1: “Apalāpāyaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā nippalāpāyaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā suddhā sāre patiṭṭhitā.
an4.190:2.2: Tathārūpo ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhusaṅgho, tathārūpāyaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā.
an4.190:2.3: Yathārūpā parisā dullabhā dassanāyapi lokasmiṁ, tathārūpo ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhusaṅgho, tathārūpāyaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā.
an4.190:2.4: Yathārūpā parisā āhuneyyā pāhuneyyā dakkhiṇeyyā añjalikaraṇīyā anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa, tathārūpo ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhusaṅgho, tathārūpāyaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā.
an4.190:2.5: Yathārūpāya parisāya appaṁ dinnaṁ bahu hoti bahu dinnaṁ bahutaraṁ, tathārūpo ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhusaṅgho, tathārūpāyaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā.
an4.190:2.6: Yathārūpaṁ parisaṁ alaṁ yojanagaṇanānipi dassanāya gantuṁ api puṭosenāpi, tathārūpo ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhusaṅgho, tathārūpāyaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā.
an4.190:3.1: Santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe devappattā viharanti;
an4.190:3.2: santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe brahmappattā viharanti;
an4.190:3.3: santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe āneñjappattā viharanti;
an4.190:3.4: santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe ariyappattā viharanti.
an4.190:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
an4.190:4.3: vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.190:4.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu devappatto hoti.
an4.190:5.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati, tathā
an4.190:5.2_1: dutiyaṁ tathā tatiyaṁ tathā catutthaṁ. Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya
an4.190:5.2_2: sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena
an4.190:5.5_0: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṁ tathā tatiyaṁ
an4.190:5.5_1: tathā catutthaṁ. Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ upekkhāsahagatena
an4.190:5.5_2: cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.
an4.190:5.6: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu brahmappatto hoti.
an4.190:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.190:6.3: Sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.190:6.4: Sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.190:6.5: Sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4.190:6.6: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āneñjappatto hoti.
an4.190:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
an4.190:7.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyappatto hotī”ti.
an4.191:1.1: “Sotānugatānaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṁ, vacasā paricitānaṁ, manasānupekkhitānaṁ, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṁ cattāro ānisaṁsā pāṭikaṅkhā.
an4.191:1.4: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
an4.191:1.5: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
an4.191:1.6: So muṭṭhassati kālaṁ kurumāno aññataraṁ devanikāyaṁ upapajjati.
an4.191:1.9: atha so satto khippaṁyeva visesagāmī hoti.
an4.191:1.10: Sotānugatānaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṁ, vacasā paricitānaṁ, manasānupekkhitānaṁ, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṁ ayaṁ paṭhamo ānisaṁso pāṭikaṅkho.
an4.191:2.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaṁ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.191:2.2: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
an4.191:2.3: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
an4.191:2.4: So muṭṭhassati kālaṁ kurumāno aññataraṁ devanikāyaṁ upapajjati.
an4.191:2.5: Tassa tattha na heva kho sukhino dhammapadā plavanti;
an4.191:2.6: api ca kho bhikkhu iddhimā cetovasippatto devaparisāyaṁ dhammaṁ deseti.
an4.191:2.8: ‘ayaṁ vā so dhammavinayo, yatthāhaṁ pubbe brahmacariyaṁ acarin’ti.
an4.191:2.10: atha so satto khippameva visesagāmī hoti.
an4.191:2.13: Tassa na heva kho assa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā:
an4.191:2.14: ‘bherisaddo nu kho, na nu kho bherisaddo’ti.
an4.191:2.16: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaṁ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.191:2.17: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
an4.191:2.18: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
an4.191:2.19: So muṭṭhassati kālaṁ kurumāno aññataraṁ devanikāyaṁ upapajjati.
an4.191:2.20: Tassa tattha na heva kho sukhino dhammapadā plavanti;
an4.191:2.21: api ca kho bhikkhu iddhimā cetovasippatto devaparisāyaṁ dhammaṁ deseti.
an4.191:2.23: ‘ayaṁ vā so dhammavinayo, yatthāhaṁ pubbe brahmacariyaṁ acarin’ti.
an4.191:2.25: atha so satto khippaṁyeva visesagāmī hoti.
an4.191:2.26: Sotānugatānaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṁ, vacasā paricitānaṁ, manasānupekkhitānaṁ, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṁ ayaṁ dutiyo ānisaṁso pāṭikaṅkho.
an4.191:3.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaṁ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.191:3.2: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
an4.191:3.3: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
an4.191:3.4: So muṭṭhassati kālaṁ kurumāno aññataraṁ devanikāyaṁ upapajjati.
